listWit.head: Handschriften mit blossem Text.
listWit.witness: Bodleyan libr., Wislon 420, auf 24 foll., in europäischer Weise neben einander liegend. Moderne gute Abschrift. Ohne Unterschrift, am Schluss nur: samāptam.

eine von Bühler geliehen erhaltene Abschrift, auf 37 foll., von der ganz dasselbe gilt, was soeben von γ bemerkt ward. Am Schluss: iti Hālasaptaśatī. Als Ueberschrift in rother Dinte: Śālivāhanaspataśatī. Eigentümlich ist, dass nt und tt meist nicht zu scheiden sind, ch vielfach als śc gegeben und h mehrfahr zwischen Vocalen eingefügt ist. Die einzelnen Worte sind gorssentheils durch kleine rothe Striche rechts darüber von einander getrennt.

Ein von Bühler geliehen erhaltenes treffliches Mspt>, auf 23 foll.; in Innern bezeichnet: iti śrī Hāla viracite gāthākośe ...; am Schluss: iti kavivatsalamahārājaśrīśālivaāhanakṛte saptaśatake gāthākośe ... saṃvat 1656 ... raïvāsāmadhye paṃ. nāthena ālekhitaṃ śubham astu | akabvararājye.
Eine von Burnell erhaltene moderne Abschrift in Teliṅga-Schrift, jetzt Berlin ms. or. quart 555, Copie eines mit der Nro. 10283 bezeichneten Codex.

listWit.head: Die Handschriften mit Text und Commentar, oder mit Commentar allein.
a. die Vulgata.
listWit.witness: Kulanātha's Commentar, Handschrift aus der Bibliothek Fitz Edward Hall's, mit Text; Fragment, umfasstu nur 370 vv. Beginnt: natvā śaṃbhuṃ yatnād gabhīravahvarthasaptaśatakasya | vyākriyate bhāvalavaḥ kaścit kulanāthadevena ||. Dieses Mspt. liegt meiner ersten Abh. über Hāla zu Grunde, s. daselbst p. 16 fg. Charakteristich für Kul. sind die Cento-nāndī und die Angaben der Autoren in Prākṛt bei v. 4-9. 11. 13. 14. Die yaśruti liegt in diesem Mspt. sporadisch vor; auch hat es häufig ĕ im Auslaut des Singular Fem. Bemerkenswerth ist auch die Schreibung: Goḍā, mit ḍ statt l.

Gaṅgādhara's Commentar. Beginnt: natvā dhuṃḍhipadāvjaṃ gaṅgādharabhaṭṭanirmitā ṭīkā | saptaśatabhāvaleśa- prakāśikā śodhyatāṃ vijñaiḥ ||. Hiervon hatte ich mehrere Mss. zur Disposition, und zwar theils vollständige, theils Bruckstücke. Nur eins derselben aber (B) war von dem Text begleitet, umfasst jedoch leider nur die ersten 129 vv., die übrigen geben nur je das pratīkam jedes Verses. Es sind im Ganzen fünf Mss., nämlich:
India Office Library 944 (resp. meine Abschrift davon), auf 96 foll., ohne Datum; schliesst: iti Gaṅgādharabhaṭṭaviracitā prākṛtaśataśayyākāvyasya ṭikā samāptā. Stammt aus Colebrooke's Bibliothek. Hat mehrere Lücken, ist aber im Ganzen gut. das eben erwähnte vom Text begleitete Fragment (v. 1-129), nach Bombay gehörig, und von da durch Bühler geliehen erhalten. Eine von Bühler geliehen erhaltene moderne Abschrift, auf 75 foll., stammt aus gleicher Quelle wie A, da es dieselbe Unterschrift, und vor Allem ganz dieselben Lücken und Felher hat (a. bei 474. 537. 553. 562. 616. 670); in eingigen Fällen ist E jedoch vollständiger und correcter als A, s. bei 107. 596. 621. Die Cento schliessen auf 14b, 26a, 35b, 45a, 54b, 64b, 75a. Durch Prof. Griffith für mich in Benares besorgte Abschrift, auf 40 foll., die drei Cento 301-600 enthaltend (1 bis 14a, 2 bis 26b); nicht seht correct, aber aus einem guten Mspt. abgeschriben; die Lücken in AE finden hier ihre Ergänzung. Auszüge aus Gaṅgādhara zu v. 21-165, welche auf den ersten 29 foll. von π, s. unten, am Rande hinzugefügt sind. Bei v. 107 zeigt sich β, in Uebereinstimmung mit E, vollständiger als A.

Pītāmbara's Commentar und Text, IOL 2796, auf 63 foll., Teliṅga-Schrift, nur v. 1-300. Die Collation dieser Handschrift, nebst Auszügen aus dem Commentar, hat mir Dr. R. Pischel, während seines Aufenthaltes in London im Sommer 1872, freundlichst besorgt. Text sehr incorrect, die darauf stets folgende Uebersetzung correcter, obschon auch sehr fehlerhaft. Der Commentar reicht nur bis in die Mitte von v. 151 (K 150, G148); von v. 229 (G 226) an abwechselnd entweder nur Prākṛt-Text oder Sanskṛt-Uebersetzung; erst die Unterschrift des dritten Cento erscheint wieder in doppelter Gestalt. --- Theilt mit Kul. die Cento-nāndī und die Autoren-Angaben. Die Letzteren gehen aber hier durch, wenigstens so weit der Commentar selbst reicht (resp. blos bis v. 148, G 145), sind im Uebrigen in Sanskṛt, nicht in Prākṛt abgefasst. --- Bemerkenswerth ist das Citat einer Bhaṭṭaṭīkā zu v. 123 (G 120, Retr. p. 379), das resp. zu Gaṅgādharabhaṭṭa nicht stimmt.

>Ein anonymer Commentar, ohne Text, in zwei modernen Abschriten, von denen die eine = ξ (32 foll.) nur v. 1-262 (G 263) umfasst, die andere = π (138 foll.), von v. 21-703 (G 697) reicht. Beide von Bühler geliehen erhalten.
ξ ist nach Art indischer Handschriften geschrieben und leidlich correct; beginnt: nṛsiṃhaṃ saccidānaṃdaṃ pūrṇaṃ brahma sanātanaṃ | gāthāsaptaśatīṭīkāṃ kurve katvā 'rināśakaṃ || graṃthāraṃbe prāripsitavighnavighātaṃ maṃgalaṃ prāmṛśati pasuvaïno iti. Stammt jedenfalls, weil meist wörtlich identisch mit π, aus der gleichen Quelle, als dieses, ist jedoch mehrfach kürzer, und zeigt auch sonstige Differenzen, so dass eine Benutzung von ξ durch π ausgeschlossen ist. π ist eine ganz moderne Abschrift, auf 138 Bll. in hoch folio; die Blätter sind nur auf einer Seite beschrieben,und liegen in europäischer Weise neben einander.
Ein zweiter anonymer Commentar, ohne Text, ṿ133-700, 75 foll. (gezählt 1-75), von Bühler geliehen erhalten. Anfang und Schluss fehlen leider.

listWit.head: b. die Recension der Sādhāraṇadeva.
listWit.witness: Handschrift der IOL 175, auf 124 foll., saṃvat 1672 (AD 1616). Beginnt: īrṣyākṛṭabhavānī-karahatasaṃdhyāṃjalikriyādusthaḥ (!) | kṛtavāmāvāmārdhaḥ purātano hantu duritaṃ vaḥ || 1 || ... paśyata rāṇaka (! eine Länge fehlt) śrī-sādhāraṇadevaviracitāṃ ṭīkāṃ | gāthāsaptaśatīnāṃ rasikā(ṃ) muktāvalīnāmnīṃ || 5 ||, --- schliesst: yady api sālaṃkārāḥ sarasā lokoktidṛṣṭavinyāsāḥ | muktāvalyāṃ gāthās tathā 'pi gāḍhaṃ virājaṃte || vāmanadevasya naptrā malladevasūnunā (Metrum gestört) yatnāt | śrī-sādhāraṇadevene'yaṃ muktāvalī racitā || sādhāraṇadevakṛtā saptaśatikāṭīkā muktāvalīyaṃ samāptā |.

listWit.head: c. die Teliṅga-Recension.
listWit.witness: Ein Commentar, in einer ebenfalls von Burnell erhaltenen modernen Abschrift in Telíṅga-Schrift, jetzt Berlin ms. or. quart. 556, Copie eines mit Nro. 10284 bezeichneten Grantha-Codex, und mir ebenso wie die Text-Mss., s. oben p. XXX, durch Siegfried Goldschmidt in lateinischer Umschrift zugänglich gemacht.

listWit.head: d. die zweite Teliṅga-Recension.
listWit.witness: Nro. 10287 enthält zugleich auch den Tent und Commentar dazu.

lg.l: ﻿pasuvaïṇo rosāruṇapaḍimāsaṃkaṃtagorimuhaaṃdam
gahiagghapaṃkaaṃ mia saṃjhāsalilaṃjaliṃ ṇamaha
amiaṃ pāuakavvaṃ paḍhiuṃ souṃ ca je ṇa āṇaṃti
kāmassa tattatattiṃ kuṇaṃti te kaha ṇa lajjaṃti
satta saāiṃ kaïvacchaleṇa koḍīa majjhaārammi
hāleṇa viraïāiṃ sālaṃkārāṇa gāhāṇaṃ
ua ṇiccalaṇippaṃdā bhisiṇīvattammi rehaï valāā
ṇimmalamaragaabhāaṇapariṭṭhiā saṃkhasutti vva
tāva ccia raïsamae mahilāṇaṃ vibbhamā virāaṃti
jāva ṇa kuvalaadalasacchahāi maülaṃti ṇaaṇāiṃ
ṇohaliam appaṇo kiṃ ṇa maggase maggase kuravaassa
eaṃ khu suhaa tuha hasaï valiamuhapaṃkaaṃ jāā
tāvijjaṃti asoehi laḍahavilaāu daïavirahammi
kiṃ sahaï ko vi kassa vi pāapahāraṃ pahuppaṃto
attā taha ramaṇijjaṃ aṃhaṃ gāmassa maṃḍaṇīhūaṃ
luatilavāḍisaricchaṃ sisireṇakaaṃ bhisiṇisaṃḍaṃ
kiṃ ruasi oṇaamuhī dhavalāaṃtesu sālichettesu
hariālamaṃḍiamuhī ṇaḍi vva saṇavāḍiā jāā

text.head: 10. (276 S, 292 T) Sirirāassa K, Anīkasya P.

lg.l: sahi erisi ccia gaī mā ruvvasurua taṃsavaliamuhaaṃdaṃ
eāṇa vālavāluṃkibālavāluṃkivālavālukkibālakarkaṭīvālakarkataṃtukuḍilāṇa pemmāṇaṃ
pāapaḍiassa païṇo puṭṭhiṃ putte samāruhaṃtammi
daḍhamaṇṇudūmiāi vihāso ghariṇīa ṇikkaṃto
saccaṃ jāṇaï daṭṭhaṃ sarisammi jaṇammi jujjae rāo
maraü ṇa tumaṃ bhaṇissaṃ maraṇaṃ pi salāhanijjaṃ se
raṃdhaṇakammaṇiuṇie mā jūrasu rattapāḍalasuaṃdhaṃ
muhamāruaṃ piaṃto dhūmāi sihī ṇa pajjalaï
ghariṇīa mahāṇasakammalaggamasimaïlieṇa hattheṇa
chittaṃ muhaṃ hasijjaï caṃdāvatthaṃ gaaṃ païṇā
kiṃ kiṃ de paḍihāsaï sahīhi ia pucchiāi muddhāe
paḍhamuggaadohaliṇīa ṇavara daïaṃ gaā diṭṭhī
amaamaa gaaṇasehara raaṇīmukhatilaa caṃda de chivasu
chitto jehi jiaamo mamaṃ pi tehiṃ cia karehiṃ
ehijja so paüttho ahaaṃ kuppejja so vi aṇuṇejja
ia kassa vi phalaï maṇoramāṇa mālā piaamammi
duggaakuḍaṃvaaṭṭhī kaha ṇu mae dhoieṇa soḍhavvā
dasiosaraṃtasalileṇa uaha ruṇṇaṃ va paḍaeṇa
kosaṃvakisalavaṇṇaa taṇṇaa uṇṇāmiehi kaṇṇehiṃ
hiaaṭṭhiaṃ gharaṃ vaccamāṇa dhavalattaṇaṃ pāva
aliapasuttaa viṇimīliaccha de suhaa majjha oāsaṃ
gaṃḍapariuṃ vaṇāpulaïaṃga ṇa puṇo cirāissaṃ
asamatta maṃḍaṇa ccia vacca gharaṃ se sakouhallassa
volāviahalahalaassa putti citte ṇa laggihisi
āarapaṇāmioṭṭaṃ aghaḍiaṇāsaṃ asaṃhaaṇiḍālaṃ
vaṇṇaghialittamuhie tīe pariuṃvaṇaṃ bharimo
āṇāsaāi deṃtī taha surae harisaviasiakavolā
gose vi oṇaamuhī aha se tti piaṃ ṇa saddhahimo
piaviraho appiadaṃsaṇaṃ ca garuāi do vi dukkhāi
jīa tumaṃ kārijjasi tīa ṇamo āhijāīe
ekko vi kālasāro ṇa dei gaṃtuṃ paāhiṇa calaṃto
kiṃ uṇa vāhāuliaṃ loaṇajualaṃ piaamāe
ṇa kuṇaṃto ccia māṇaṃ ṇisāsu suhasuttadaravivuddhānaṃ
suṇṇaïapāsaparimusaṇaveaṇaṃ jaï si jānaṃto
paṇaakuviāṇa doṇha vi aliapasuttāṇa māṇaïllāṇa
ṇiccalaṇiruddhaṇīsāsadiṇṇaaṇṇāṇa ko mallo
ṇavalaïpaharaṃ aṃge jahiṃ jahiṃ mahaï dearo dāuṃ
romaṃca daṃdarāī tahiṃ tahiṃ dīsaï vahūe
ajja mae teṇa viṇā aṇuhūasuhāi saṃbharaṃtīe
ahiṇavamehāṇa ravo ṇisāmio vajjhapaḍato vva
ṇikkiva jāābhīrua duddaṃsaṇa ṇiṃvakīḍasāriccha
gāmo gāmaṇiṇaṃdaṇa tujjha kae taha vitaṇuāi
paharavaṇamaggavisame jāā kiccheṇa lahaï se ṇiddaṃ
gāmaṇiuttassa ure pallī uṇa se suhaṃ suaï
aha saṃbhāviamaggo suhaa tue ccea ṇavara ṇivvūḍho
eṇhiṃ hiae aṇṇaṃ aṇṇaṃ vāāi loassa
uṇhāi ṇīsasaṃto kīsa maha paraṃmuhīa saaṇaddhe
hiaaṃ palīviuṃ aṇusaeṇa puṭṭhiṃ palīvesi
tuha virahe ciraāraa tissā ṇivaḍaṃtavāhamaïleṇa
raïrahasiharadhaeṇa va muheṇa chāhi ccia ṇa pattā
diarassa asuddhamaṇassa kulavahūṇiaakuḍḍalihiāi
diahaṃ kahei rāmāṇulaggasomitticariāiṃ
cattaraghariṇī piadaṃsaṇā a taruṇī paütthavaïāa
asaī saajjiāduggaā a ṇaha khaṃḍiaṃ sīlaṃ
tālūrabhamāulakhuḍiakesaro giriṇaīapūreṇa
daravuḍḍavuḍḍaṇivvuḍḍamahuaro hīlaï kalaṃvo
ahiāimāṇiṇo duggaassa chāiṃ païssa rakkhaṃhī
ṇiavaṃdhavāṇa jūraï ghariṇī vihaveṇa eṃtāṇaṃ
sāhīṇe vi piaame patte vi chaṇe ṇa maṃḍio appā
duggaapaütthavaïaṃ saajjiaṃ saṃṭhavaṃtīe
tujjha vasaï tti hiaaṃ imehi diṭṭho tumaṃ ti acchīiṃ
tuha virahe kisiāi ti tīe aṃgāi vi piāiṃ
sabbhāvaṇe habharie ratte rajjijjaï tti juttam iṇaṃ
aṇahiae uṇa hiaaṃ jaṃ dijjaï taṃ jaṇo hasaï
āraṃbhaṃtassa dhuaṃ lacchī maraṇaṃ va hoi purisassa
taṃ maraṇam aṇāraṃbhe vi hoi lacchī uṇa ṇa hoi
virahāṇalo sahijjaï āsāvaṃdheṇa vallahajaṇassa
ekkaggāmapavāso māe maraṇaṃ visesei
akkhaḍaï piā hiae aṇṇaṃ mahilāaṇaṃ ramaṃtassa
diṭṭhe sarisammi guṇe sarisammi guṇe aīsaṃte
ṇaïpūrasacchahe jovvaṇammi aïpavasiesudiahesu
aṇiattāsu a rāīsu putti kiṃ daḍḍhamāṇeṇa
kallaṃ kira kharatiao pavasihaï pio tti suvvaï jaṇammi
taha vaḍḍha bhaavaï ṇise jaha se kallaṃ cia ṇa hoi
hoṃtapahiassa jāā āucchaṇajīadhāraṇarahassaṃ
pucchaṃtī bhamaï gharaṃ ghareṇa piavirahasahirīo
aṇṇamahilāpasaṃgaṃ de devva karesu amha daïassa
purisā ekkaṃtarasā ṇa hu dosaguṇe viāṇaṃti
thoaṃ pi ṇa ṇīi imā majjhaṇhe ua sarīratalalukkā
āavabhaeṇa chāhī vi tā pahia kiṃ ṇa vīsamasī
suhaücchaaṃ jaṇaṃ dullahaṃ pi dūrāhi amha āṇeṃta
uaāraa jara jīaṃ pi ṇeṃta ṇa kaāvarāhosi
āma jaro me maṃdo ahava ṇa maṃdo jaṇassa kā tattī
suhaücchaa suhaa suaṃdhagaṃdha mā gaṃdhiriṃ chivasu
sihipicchaluliakese vevaṃtoru viṇimīliaddhacchī
darapurisāini visamiri jāṇasu purisāṇa jaṃ dukkhaṃ
pemmassa virohiasaṃdhiassa paccakkhadiṭṭhaviliassa
uaassa va tāviasīalassa viraso raso hoi
vajjavaḍanāirikkaṃ païṇo soūṇa siṃjiṇīghosaṃ
pusiāi karimarīe sarivaṃdīṇaṃ pi acchīiṃ
karimari aālagajjirajalaāsaṇivaḍaṇapaḍiravo eso
païṇo dhaṇurava kaṃkhiri romaṃcaṃ kiṃ muhā vahasi
sahaï sahaï tti teṇa tahā ramiā suraaduvviaḍḍeṇa
pavvāasirīsāi va jaha se jāāi aṃgāiṃ
agaṇiasesajuāṇā vālaa volīṇaloamajjāā
aha sā bhamaï disāmuhapasāriacchī tuha kaeṇa
ajjaṃ cea paüttho ujjāgarao jaṇassa ajjea
ajjea haliddāpiṃjarāi golāi tūhāiṃ
asarisacitte diare suddhamaṇā piaame visamasīle
ṇa kahaï kuḍuṃvavihaḍaṇabhaeṇa taṇuāae soṇhā
ciṃtāṇiadaïasamāgamammi kaamaṇṇuāi bhariūṇa
suṇṇaṃ kalahā aṃtī sahīhi ruṇṇā ṇa ohasiā
hiaaṇṇuehi samaaṃ asamattāiṃ pi jaha suhāveṃti
kajjāi maṇe ṇa tahā iarehi samāṇiāiṃ pi
daraphuḍiasippisaṃpuḍaṇilukkahālāhalaggacheppaṇihaṃ
pikkaṃvaṭṭhiviṇiggaakomalam aṃvaṃkuraṃ uaha
uaha paḍalaṃtaroiṇṇaṇiaataṃtuddhapāapaḍilaggaṃ
dullakkhasuttagutthekkavaülakusumaṃ va makkaḍaaṃ
uaridaraḍiṭṭhakhaṇṇuaṇilukkapārāvaāṇa viruehiṃ
ṇitthaṇaï jāaviaṇaṃ sūlāhiṇṇaṃ va devaülaṃ
jaï hosi ṇa tassa piā aṇudiahaṃ ṇīsahehi aṃgehiṃ
ṇavasūapīapeosamattapāḍi vva kiṃ suasi
hemaṃtiāsu aïdīharāsu rāīsu taṃ si aviṇiddā
ciraarapaütthavaïe ṇa suṃdaraṃ jaṃ diā suasi
jaï cikkhillabhaüppuapaam iṇam alasāi tuha pae diṇṇaṃ
tā suhaa kaṃḍaïjjaṃtam aṃgam eṇhiṃ kiṇo vahasi
patto chaṇo ṇa sohaï aïppahāe vva puṇṇimāaṃdo
aṃtaviraso vva kāmo asaṃpaāṇo a parioso
pāṇiggahaṇe ccia pavvaīa ṇāaṃ sahīhi sohaggaṃ
pasuvaïṇā vāsuikaṃkaṇammi osārie dūraṃ
giṃhe davaggimasimaïliāi dīsaṃti viṃjhasiharāiṃ
āsasu paütthavaïe ṇa hoṃti ṇavapāusabbhāiṃ
jettiamettaṃ tīraï ṇivvoḍhuṃ desu tettiaṃ paṇaaṃ
ṇa jaṇo viṇiattapasāadukkhasahaṇakkhamo savvo
vahuvallahassa jā hoi vallahā kaha vi paṃca diahāiṃ
sā kiṃ chaṭṭhaṃ maggaï katto miṭṭhaṃ ca vahuaṃ ca
jaṃ jaṃ so ṇijjhāaï aṃgoāsaṃ mahaṃ aṇimisaccho
pacchāemi a taṃ taṃ icchāmi a teṇa dīsaṃtaṃ
daḍhamaṇṇudūmiāi vi gahio daïammi pechaha imīe
osaraï vāluāmuṭṭhio vva māṇo surasuraṃto
ua pommarāamaragaasaṃvaliā ṇahaalāu oaraï
ṇahasirikaṃṭhabbhaṭṭha vva kaṃṭhiā kīrariṃcholī
ṇa vi taha viesavāso doggaccaṃ maha jaṇei saṃtāvaṃ
āsaṃsiatthavimuho jaha paṇaïaṇo ṇiattaṃto
khaṃdhaggiṇā vaṇesuṃ taṇehi gāmammi rakkhio pahio
ṇaaravasio ṇaḍijjaï sāṇusaeṇa vva sīeṇa
bharimo se gahiāharadhuasīsapaholirālaāuliaṃ
vaaṇaṃ parimalataraliabhamarālipaïṇṇakamalaṃ va
hallaphalaṇhāṇapasāhiāṇa chaṇavāsare savattīṇa
ajjāi majjaṇāṇāareṇa kahiaṃ va sohaggaṃ
ṇhāṇahaliddābhariaṃtarāi jālāi jālavalaassa
sohaṃti kiliṃciakaṃṭaeṇa kaṃ kāhisi kaatthaṃ
addaṃsaṇeṇa pemmaṃ avei aïdaṃsaṇeṇa vi avei
pisuṇajaṇakaṃpieṇa vi avei emea vi avei
addaṃsaṇeṇa mahilāaṇassa aïdaṃsaṇeṇa ṇīassa
mukkhassa pisuṇaaṇajaṃpieṇa emea vi khalassa
poṭṭapaḍiehi dukkhaṃ acchijjaï uṇṇaehi hoūṇa
ia ciṃtaṃtāṇa maṇe thaṇāṇa kasaṇaṃ muhaṃ jāaṃ
so tujjha kae suṃdari taha jhīṇo sumahilo haliaütto
jaha se macchariṇīa vi doccaṃ jāāi paḍivaṇṇaṃ
dakkhiṇṇeṇa vi eṃto suhaa suhāvesi aṃha hiaāiṃ
ṇikkaïaveṇa jāṇaṃ gao si kā ṇivvuī tāṇaṃ

ciraālamaṃdapecchittaṇeṇa puriso haṇaï kajjaṃ
vālaa tumāhi ahiaṃ ṇiaaṃ cia vallahaṃ mahaṃ jīaṃ
taṃ taï viṇā ṇa hoi tti teṇa kuviaṃ pasāemi
pattia ṇa pattiaṃtī jaï tujjha ime ṇa majjha ruirīe
puṭṭhīa vāhaviṃdū pulaübbhee ṇa bhijjaṃtā
taṃ mittaṃ kāavvaṃ jaṃ kira vasaṇammi desaālammi
ālihiabhittivāullaa vva ṇa paraṃmuhaṃ ṭhāi
vahuāi ṇaïṇiuṃje paḍhamuggaasīlakhaṃḍaṇavilakkhaṃ
uḍḍei vihaṃgaülaṃ hāhā pakkhehi va bhaṇaṃtaṃ
saccaṃ bhaṇāmi vālaa ṇa tthi asakkaṃ vasaṃtamāsassa
gaṃdheṇa kuruvaāṇaṃ maṇaṃ pi asaïttanaṃ ṇa gaā
ekkekkamavaïveḍhaṇavivaraṃtaradiṇṇataralaṇaaṇāe
taï volaṃte vālaa paṃjarasaüṇāiaṃ tīe
tā kiṃ kareu jaï taṃ si tīa vaïveḍhapelliathaṇīe
pāaṃguṭṭhaggukkhittaṇīsahaṃgīa vi ṇa diṭṭho
piasaṃbharaṇapaloṭṭaṃtavāhadhārāṇivāabhīāe
dijjaï vaṃkaggīvāi dīvao pahiajāāe
taï volaṃte vālaa tissā aṃgāi taha ṇu valiāiṃ
jaha puṭṭhimajjhaṇivaḍaṃtavāhadhārāu dīsaṃti
tā majjhimo ccia varaṃ dujjaṇasuaṇehi dohi vi ṇa kajjaṃ
jaha diṭṭho tavaï khalo tahea suaṇo aīsaṃto
addhacchipecchiaṃ mā karehi sāhāviaṃ paloehi
so vi sudiṭṭho hohii tumaṃ pi muddhā kalijjhihisi
diahaṃ khuḍukkiāe tīe kāūṇa gehavāvāraṃ
garue vi maṇṇudukkhe bharimo pāaṃtasuttassa
pāṇaüḍīa vi jaliūṇa huavaho jalaï jaṇṇavāḍammi
ṇa hu te parihariavvā visamadasāsaṃṭhiā purisā
jaṃ tujjha saī jāā asaīo suhaa jaṃ ca amhe vi
tā kiṃ phuṭṭaü vīaṃ tujjha samāṇo juā ṇa tthi
savvassammi vi ḍaḍḍhe taha vi hu hiaassa ṇivvui ccea
jaṃ tena gāmaḍāhe hatthāhatthiṃ kuḍo gahio
jāejja vaṇuddese khujjo vi hu ṇīsaho siḍhilavatto
mā māṇusammi loe cāī rasio dariddo a
tassa a sohaggaguṇaṃ amahilasarisaṃ ca sāhasaṃ majjha
jāṇaï golāūro vāsārattaddharatto a
te voliā vaassā tāṇa kuḍuṃgāṇa khaṇṇuā sesā
amhe vi gaavaāo mūluccheaṃ gaaṃ pemmaṃ
thaṇajahaṇaṇiaṃvovari ṇaharaṃkā gaavaāṇa vilaāṇaṃ
uvvasiāṇaṃgaṇivāsamūlavaṃdha vva dīsaṃti
jassa jahiṃ cia paḍhamaṃ tissā aṃgammi ṇivaḍiā diṭṭhī
tassa tahiṃ cea ṭhiā savvaṃgaṃ keṇa vi ṇa diṭṭhaṃ
virahe visaṃ va visamā amaamaā hoi saṃgame ahiaṃ
kiṃ vihiṇā samaaṃ cia dohiṃ pi piā viṇimmaviā
addaṃsaṇeṇa puttaa suṭṭhu vi ṇehāṇuvaṃdhaghaḍiāiṃ
hatthaüḍapāṇiāi va kāleṇa galaṃti pemmāiṃ
païpurao ccia ṇijjaï viṃchuaḍaṭṭhe 'ti jāravejjagharaṃ
ṇiuṇasahīkaradhariā bhuajualaṃdolirī vālā
vikkiṇaï māhamāsaṃmi pāmaro pāriḍiṃ vaïlleṇa
ṇiddhūmamummure sāmalīa thaṇae ṇiacchaṃto
saccaṃ bhaṇāmi maraṇe ṭhia mhi puṇṇe taḍammi tāvīe
ajja vi tattha kuḍuṃge ṇivaḍaï diṭṭhī taha ccea
aṃdhaaravorapatthiṃ va māuā maha païṃ viluṃpaṃti
īsāaṃti maha ccia cheppāhiṃto phaṇo jāo
appattapattaaṃ pāviūṇa ṇavaraṃgaaṃ haliasoṇhā
uaha taṇuī ṇa māaï ruṃdāsu vi gāmaracchāsu
vakkhevaāi piajaṃpiāi parahiaaṇivvuiarāi
viralo hu jāṇaï jaṇo uppaṇṇe jaṃpiavvāiṃ
chajjaï pahussa laliaṃ piāi māṇo khamā samatthassa
jāṇaṃtassa a bhaṇiaṃ moṇaṃ ca aāṇamāṇassa
vevirasiṇṇakaraṃgulipariggahakkhalialegaṇīmagge
sotthi ccia ṇa samappaï piasahi lehammi kiṃ lihimo
devvammi parāhutte pattia ghaḍiaṃ pi vihaḍaï ṇarāṇaṃ
kajjaṃ vāluavaraṇaṃ va kaha vi vaṃdhaṃ cia ṇa dei
māmi hiaaṃ va pīaṃ teṇa juāṇeṇa majjamāṇāe
ṇhāṇahaliddākaḍuaṃ aṇusotta jalaṃ piaṃteṇa
jiviaṃ asāsaaṃ cia ṇa ṇiattaï jovvaṇaṃ aïkkaṃtaṃ
diahā diahehi samā ṇa hoṃti kiṃ ṇiṭṭhuro loo
uppāiadavvāṇa vi khalāṇa ko bhāaṇaṃ khalo ccea
pikkāi vi ṇiṃvaphalāi ṇavara kāehi khajjaṃti
ajja mae gaṃtavvaṃ ghaṇaṃdhaāre vi tassa suhaassa
ajjā ṇimīliacchī paaparivāḍiṃ ghare kuṇaï
suaṇo ṇa kuppaï ccia aha kuppaï vippiaṃ ṇa ciṃtei
aha ciṃtei ṇa jaṃpaï aha jaṃpaï lajjio hoi
so attho jo hatthe taṃ mittaṃ jaṃ ṇiraṃtaraṃ vasaṇe
taṃ rūaṃ jattha guṇā taṃ viṇṇāṇaṃ jahiṃ dhammo
caṃdamuhi caṃdadhavalā dīhā dīhacchi tuha vioammi
caüjāmā saajāma vva jāmiṇī kaha vi volīṇā
aülīṇo domuhao tā mahuro bhoaṇaṃ muhe jāva
murao vva khalo jiṇṇammi bhoaṇe virasam ārasaï
taha soṇhāi pulaïo daravaliāvaṃgatāraaṃ pahio
jaha vārio vi gharasāmieṇa āliṃdae vasio
lahuaṃti lahuṃ purisaṃ pavvaamettaṃ pi do vi kajjāiṃ
ṇivvaraṇam aṇivvūḍhe ṇivvūḍhe jaṃ aṇivvaraṇaṃ
kaṃ tuṃgathaṇukkhitteṇa putti dāraṭṭhiā paloesi
uṇṇāmiakalasaṇivesiagghakamaleṇa va muheṇa
vaïvivaraṇiggaadalo eraṃḍo sāhaï vva taruṇāṇaṃ
ettha ghare haliavahū eddahamettatthaṇī vasaï
gaakalahakuṃbhasaṃṇihaghaṇapīṇaṇiraṃtarehi tuṃgehiṃ
gūsasiuṃ pi ṇa tīraï kiṃ puṇa gaṃtuṃ haathaṇehiṃ
māsapasūaṃ chammāsagabbhiṇiṃ ekkadiahajariaṃ ca
raṃguttiṇṇaṃ ca piaṃ puttaa kāmaṃtao hohi
paḍivakkhamaṇṇupuṃje lāvaṇṇaüḍe aṇaṃgagaakuṃbhe
purisasaahiaadharie kīsa thaṇaṃtī thaṇe vahasi
ghariṇīghaṇathaṇapellaṇasuhellipaḍiassa hoṃtapahiassa
avasaüṇaṃgāraavāraviṭṭhidiahā suhāveṃti
sā tujjha kae vālaa aṇisaṃ gharadāratoraṇaṇisaṇṇā
osūsaï vaṃdaṇamālia vva diahaṃ cia varāī
hasiaṃ sahatthatālaṃ sukkhavaḍaṃ uvagaehi pahiehiṃ
pattaaphalāṇa sarise uḍḍīṇe pūsaviṃdammi
ajja mhi hāsiā māmi teṇa pāesu taha paḍaṃteṇa
tīe vi jalaṃtiṃ dīvavattim abbhuttaaṃtīe
aṇuvattaṇaṃ kuṇaṃto vese vi jaṇe ahiṇṇamuharāo
appavaso vi hu suaṇo paravvaso āhiāīe
aṇudiahavaḍḍhiāara viṇṇāṇaguṇehi jaṇiamāhappo
puttaa ahiāajaṇo virajjamāṇo vi dullakkho
viṇṇāṇaguṇamahagghe purise vesattaṇaṃ pi ramaṇijjaṃ
jaṇaṇiṃdie uṇa jaṇe piattaṇeṇā 'vi lajjhāmo
kaha ṇāma tīa taha so sahāvagaruo vi thaṇaharo paḍio
ahavā mahilāṇa ciraṃ ko vi ṇa hiaammi saṃṭhāi
suanu vaaṇaṃ chivaṃtaṃ sūraṃ mā sāulīa vārehi
eassa paṃkaassa a jāṇaü kaaraṃ suhapphaṃsaṃ
māṇosahaṃ va pijjaï piāi māṇaṃsiṇīa daïassa
karasaṃpuḍavaliuddhāṇaṇāi maïrāi gaṃḍūso
kaha sā ṇivvaṇṇijjaü jīa jahāloiammi aṃgammi
diṭṭhī duvvalagāi vva paṃkapaḍiā ṇa uttaraï
kīraṃti ccia ṇāsaï uae reha vva khalaaṇe mettī
sā uṇa suaṇammi kaā aṇahā pāhāṇareha vva
avvo ukkaraāraa puṇo vi tattiṃ karesi gamaṇassa
ajja vi ṇa hoṃti saralā veṇīa taraṃgiṇo cihurā
ṇa vi taha chearaāi vi haraṃti puṇaruttarāarasiāiṃ
jaha jattha va tattha va jaha va taha va sabbhāvaṇeharamiāiṃ
ujjhasi piāi samaaṃ taha vi hu re bhaṇasu kīsa kisia tti
uaribhareṇa aāṇua muaï vaïllo vi aṃgāiṃ
daḍhamūlavaddhagaṃṭhi vva moiā kaha vi teṇa me vāhū
amhehi vi tassa ure khutta vva samukkhaā thaṇaā
aṇuṇaapasāiāe tujjha 'varāhe ciraṃ gaṇaṃtīe
apahuttohaahatthaṃgurīa ruṇṇaṃ varāīe
seacchaleṇa pecchaha taṇue aṃgammi se amāaṃtaṃ
lāvaṇṇaṃ osaraï va tivalīsovāṇavaṃtīhiṃ
devvāattammi phale kiṃ kīraü ettiaṃ puṇo bhaṇimo
kaṃkellipallavāṇaṃ ṇa pallavā hoṃti sāricchā
dhuaï vva maakalaṃkaṃ kavolapaḍiassa māṇiṇī uaha
aṇavaraavāhajalabhariaṇaaṇakalasehi caṃdassa
gaṃdheṇa appaṇo māliāṇa ṇomāliā ṇa phuṭṭihaï
aṇṇo ko vi haāsāi maṃsalo parimaluggāro
phalasaṃpattīa samoṇaāi tuṃgāi phalavipattīe
hiaāi supurisāṇaṃ mahātarūṇaṃ va siharāiṃ
āsāsei pariaṇaṃ parivattaṃtīa pahiajāāe
ṇitthāmuvvattaṇavaliahatthamuhalo valaasaddo
tuṃgo ccia hoi maṇo maṇaṃsiṇo aṃtimāsu vi dasāsu
atthamaṇammi vi raïṇo kiraṇā uddhaṃ cia phuraṃti
poṭṭaṃ bharaṃti saüṇā vi māuā appaṇo aṇuvviggā
vihaluddharaṇasahāvā huvaṃti jaï ke vi sappurisā
ṇa viṇā sabbhāveṇaṃ gheppaï paramatthajāṇuo loo
ko juṇṇamaṃjaraṃ kaṃjieṇa veāriuṃ taraï
raṇṇāu taṇaṃ raṇṇāu pāṇiaṃ savvado saaṃgāhaṃ
taha vi maāṇa maīṇa a āmaraṇaṃtāi pemmāiṃ
tāvam avaṇei ṇa tahā caṃdaṇapaṃko vi kāmimihuṇāṇaṃ
jaha dūsahe vi gimhe aṇṇoṇṇāliṃgaṇasuhellī
tuppāṇaṇā kiṇo acchasi tti paripucchiāi vahuāi
viuṇāveḍhiajahaṇatthalāi lajjoṇaaṃ hasiaṃ
hiaa ccea vilīṇo ṇa sāhio jāṇiūṇa gharasāraṃ
vaṃdhavaduvvaaṇaṃ miva dohalao duggaavahūe
dhāvaï vialiadhammillasicaasaṃjamaṇavāvaḍakaraggā
caṃḍilabhaavivalāaṃtaḍiṃbhaparimaggiṇī ghariṇī
jaha jaha uvvahaï vahū ṇavajovvaṇamaṇaharāi aṃgāi
taha taha se taṇuāaï majjho daïo a paḍivakkho
jaha jaha jarāpariṇao hoi paī duggao virūo vi
kulavāliāṇa taha taha ahiaaraṃ vallaho hoi
eso māmi juāṇo vāraṃ vāreṇa jaṃ aḍaaṇāo
gimhe gāmekkavaḍodaaṃ va kiccheṇa pāvaṃti
gāmavaḍassa piucchā āvaṃḍumuhāṇa paṃḍuracchāhaṃ
hiaeṇa samaṃ asaīṇa paḍaï vāāhaaṃ pattaṃ
pecchaï aladdhalakkhaṃ dīhaṃ ṇīsasaï suṇṇaaṃ hasaï
jaha jaṃpaï aphuḍatthaṃ taha se hiaaṭṭhiaṃ kiṃ pi
gahavaï gao mha saraṇaṃ rakkhasu eaṃ ti aḍaaṇā bhaṇiuṃ
sahasāgaassa turiaṃ païṇo ccia jāram appei
hiaechiassa dijjaü taṇuāaṃtiṃ ṇa pecchaha piucchā
hiaechio mha katto bhaṇiuṃ mohaṃ gaā kuarī
khiṇṇassa ure païṇo ṭhavei gimhāvaraṇharamiassa
ollaṃ galaṃtakusumaṃ ṇhāṇasuaṃdhaṃ cihurabhāraṃ
aha sarasadaṃtamaṃḍalakavolapaḍimāgao maacchīe
aṃtosiṃdūriasaṃkhavattakaraṇiṃ vahaï caṃdo
aha amha āao ajja kulaharāo tti cheṃchaī jāraṃ
sahasāgaassa turiaṃ païṇo kaṃṭhammi lāei
pusiā kaṇṇāharaṇeṃdaṇīlakiraṇāhaā sasimaūhā
māṇiṇivaaṇammi sakajjalaṃsusaṃkāi daïeṇa
eddahamettammi jae suṃdaramahilāsahassabharie vi
aṇuharaï ṇavara tissā vāmaddhaṃ dāhiṇaddhassa
jaha jaha vāei pio taha taha ṇaccāmi caṃcale pemme
vallī valei aṃgaṃ sahāvathaddhe vi rukkhammi
dukkhehi labbhaï pio laddho dukkhehi hoi sāhīṇo
laddho vi aladdho ccia jaï jaha hiaaṃ taha ṇa hoi
avvo aṇuṇaasuhakaṃkhirīa akaaṃ kaaṃ kuṇaṃtīe
saralasahāvo vi pio aviṇaamaggaṃ valā ṇīo
hatthesu a pāesu a aṃguligaṇaṇāi aïgaā diahā
eṇhiṃ uṇa keṇa gaṇijjaü tti bhaṇiuṃ ruaï muddhā
kīramuhasacchahehiṃ rehaï vasuhā palāsakusumehiṃ
vuddhassa calaṇavaṃdaṇapaḍiehi va bhikkhusaṃghehiṃ
jaṃ jaṃ pihulaṃ aṃgaṃ taṃ taṃ jāaṃ kisoari kisaṃ te
jaṃ taṃ taṇuaṃ taṃ taṃ pi ṇiṭṭhiaṃ kiṃ tha māṇeṇa
ṇa guṇeṇa hīraï jaṇo hīraï jo jeṇa bhāvio teṇa
mottūṇa puliṃdā mottiāi guṃjāu geṇhaṃti
laṃkālaāṇa puttaa vasaṃtamāsekkaladdhapasarāṇa
āpīalohiāṇaṃ vīhei jaṇo palāsāṇaṃ
ghettūṇa cuṇṇamuṭṭhiṃ harisūsuiāi veamāṇāe
bhisiṇemi tti piaamaṃ hatthe gaṃdhodaaṃ jāaṃ
puṭṭhiṃ pusasu kisoari paloharaṃkollapattacittaliaṃ
cheāhi diarajāāhi ujjue mā kalijjihisi
acchīi tā thaïssaṃ dohi vi hatthehi tammi diṭṭhammi
aṃgaṃ kalaṃvakusumaṃ va pulaïaṃ kaha ṇu ḍhakkissaṃ
jhaṃjhāvāuttiṇie gharammi roūṇa ṇīsahaṇisaṇṇaṃ
dāvei va gaavaïaṃ vijjujjoo jalaharāṇaṃ
bhuṃjasu jaṃ sāhīṇaṃ katto loṇaṃ kugāmariddhammi
suhaa saloṇeṇa vi kiṃ teṇa siṇeho jahiṃ ṇatthi
suhapucchiāi halio muhapaṃkaasurahipavaṇaṇivvaviaṃ
taha piaï paaïkaḍuaṃ pi osahaṃ jaha ṇa ṇiṭṭhāi
aha sā tahiṃ tahiṃ vvia vāṇīravaṇammi cuvakasaṃkeā
tuha daṃsaṇaṃ vimaggaï pabbhaṭṭaṇihāṇaṭhāṇaṃ ca
daḍharosakalusiassa vi suaṇassa muhāhi vippiaṃ kaṃto
rāhumuhammi vi sasiṇo kiraṇā amaaṃ via muaṃti
avamānio vi ṇa tahā dummijjaï sajjaṇo vihavahīṇo
paḍikāuṃ asamattho māṇijjaṃto jaha pareṇa
kalahaṃtare vi aviṇiggaāi hiaammi jaramuvagaāiṃ
suaṇakaāi rahassāi ḍahaï āukkhae aggī
lumbīo aṃgaṇamāhavīṇa dāraggalāu jāāu
āsāso paṃthapaloaṇe vi piṭṭho gaavaīṇaṃ
piadaṃsaṇasuharasamaüliāi jaï se ṇa hoṃti ṇaaṇāiṃ
tā keṇa kaṇṇaraïaṃ lakkhijjaï kuvalaaṃ tissā
cikkhillakhuttahalamuhakaḍḍhaṇasiḍhile païmmi pāsutte
appattamohaṇasuhā ghaṇasamaaṃ pāmarī savaï
dummeṃti deṃti sokkhaṃ kuṇaṃti aṇurāaaṃ ramāveṃti
araïraïvaṃdhavāṇaṃ ṇamo ṇamo maaṇavāṇāṇaṃ
kusumamaā vi aïkharā aladdhaphaṃsā vi dūsahapaāvā
bhiṃdaṃtā vi raïarā kāmassa sarā vahuviappā
īsaṃ jaṇeṃti dāveṃti mammahaṃ vippiaṃ sahāveṃti
virahe ṇa deṃti mariuṃ aho guṇā tassa vahumaggā
ṇīāi ajja ṇikkiva piṇaddhaṇavaraṃgaāi varaīe
gharaparivāḍīa paheṇaāi tuha daṃsaṇāsāe
sūijjaï hemaṃtammi duggao phuṃphuāsuaṃdheṇa
dhūmakavileṇa pariviralataṃtuṇā juṇṇapaḍaeṇa
kharasippīrullihiāi kuṇaï pahio himāgamapahāe
āamaṇajalolliahatthaphaṃsamasiṇāi aṃgāiṃ
ṇakkhukkhuḍiaṃ sahaāramaṃjariṃ pāmarassa sīsammi
vaṃdiṃ miva hīraṃtiṃ bhamarajuāṇā aṇusaraṃti
sūracchaleṇa puttaa kassa tumaṃ aṃjaliṃ paṇāmesi
hāsakaḍakkhummissā ṇa hoṃti devāṇa jokkārā
muhavijjhaviapaīvaṃ ṇiruddhasāsaṃ sasaṃkiullāvaṃ
savahasaarakkhioṭṭhaṃ coriaramiaṃ suhāvei
geacchaleṇa bhariuṃ kassa tumaṃ ruasi ṇibbharukkaṃṭhaṃ
maṇṇupaḍiruddhakaṃṭhaddhaṇiṃtakhaliakkharullāvaṃ
vahalatamāhaarāī ajja paüttho paī gharaṃ suṇṇaṃ
taha jaggesu saajjia ṇa jahā amhe musijjāmo
saṃjīvaṇosahaṃ miva suassa rakkhaï aṇaṇṇavāvārā
sāsū ṇavabbhadaṃsaṇakaṃṭhāgaajīviaṃ soṇhaṃ
ṇūṇaṃ hiaaṇihittāi vasasi jāāi amha hiaammi
aṇṇaha maṇorahā me sāhasu kaha tīa viṇṇāā
taï suhaa aīsaṃte tissā acchīhi kaṇṇalaggehiṃ
diṇṇaṃ gholiravāhehi pāṇiaṃ daṃsaṇasuhāṇaṃ
uppekkhāgaa tuha muhadaṃsaṇapaḍiruddhajīviāsāi
duhiāi mae kālo kettiametto vva ṇeavvo
volīṇālakkhiarūajovvaṇā putti kaṃ ṇa dūmesi
diṭṭhā paṇaṭṭhaporāṇajaṇavaā jammabhūmi vva
pariosaviasiehiṃ bhaṇiaṃ acchīhi teṇa jaṇamajjhe
paḍivaṇṇaṃ tīa vi uvvamaṃtaseehi aṃgehiṃ
ekkakkamasaṃdesāṇurāavaḍḍhaṃtakouhallāiṃ
dukkhaṃ asamattamaṇorahāi acchaṃti mihuṇāiṃ
jaï so ṇa vallaho ccia gottaggahaṇeṇa tassa sahi kīsa
hoi muhaṃ te raviaraphaṃsavisaṭṭaṃ va tāmarasaṃ
māṇadumaparusapavaṇassa māmi savvaṃgaṇivvuiarassa
avaūhaṇassa bhaddaṃ raïṇāḍaapuvvaraṃgassa
ṇiaāṇumāṇaṇīsaṃka hiaa de pasia virama ettāhe
amuṇiaparamatthajaṇāṇulagga kīsa mha lahuesi
osahiajaṇo païṇā salāhamāṇeṇa aïciraṃ hasio
caṃdo tti tujjha vaaṇe viiṇṇakusumaṃjalivilakkho
jhijjaṃtehi aṇudiṇaṃ paccakkhammi vi tumammi aṃgehiṃ
vālaa pucchijjaṃtī ṇa āṇimo kassa kiṃ bhaṇimo
aṃgāṇaṃ taṇuāraa sikkhāvaa dīharoiavvāṇaṃ
viṇaāikkamaāraa mā mā ṇaṃ pamhasijjāsu
aṇṇaha ṇa tīraï ccia parivaḍḍhaṃtagaruaṃ piaamassa
maraṇaviṇoeṇa viṇā viramāveuṃ virahadukkhaṃ
vaṇṇaṃtīhi tuha guṇe vahuso amhehi chiṃchaīpurao
vālaa saam ea kao si dullaho kassa kuppāmo
jāo so vi vilakkho mae vi hasiūṇa gāḍham uvaūḍho
paḍhamosariassa ṇiaṃsaṇassa gaṃṭhiṃ vimaggaṃto
kaṃḍujjuā varāī ajja tae sā kaāvarāheṇa
alasāiaruṇṇaviaṃbhiāi diaheṇa sikkhaviā
avarāhehi vi ṇa tahā pattia jaha maṃ imehi dummesi
avahatthiasabbhāvehi suhaa dakkhiṇṇabhaṇiehiṃ
mā jūra piāliṃgaṇasarahasabhamirīṇa vāhulaïāṇaṃ
tuṇhikka paruṇṇenaṃ imiṇā māṇaṃsiṇi muheṇaṃ
mā vacca pupphalāvira devā uaaṃjalīhi tūsaṃti
golāṇaīa puttaa sīlummūlāi kūlāiṃ
vaaṇe vaaṇammi calaṃtasīsasuṇṇāvahāṇahuṃkāraṃ
sahi deṃtī ṇīsāsaṃtaresu kīsa mha dūmesi
sabbhāvaṃ pucchaṃtī vālaa roāviā tuha piāe
ṇa tthi ccia kaasavahaṃ hāsummissaṃ bhaṇaṃtīe
ettha mae ramiavvaṃ tīa samaṃ ciṃtiūṇa hiaeṇa
pāmarakaraseullā ṇivaḍaï tuvarī vavijjaṃtī
gahavaïsuocciesu vi phalahīveṃṭesu uaha vahuāi
mohaṃ bhamaï pulaïo vilaggaseaṃgulī hattho
ajjaṃ mohaṇasuhiaṃ mua tti mottuṃ palāie halie
daraphuḍiaveṃṭabhāroṇaāi hasiaṃ va phalahīe
ṇīsāsukkaṃpiapulaïehi jāṇaṃti ṇacciuṃ dhaṇṇā
amhārisīhi diṭṭhe piammi appā vi vīsario
taṇueṇa vi taṇuijjaï khīṇeṇa vi khijjae valā imiṇā
majjhattheṇa vi majjheṇa putti kaha tujjha paḍivakkho
vāhi vva vejjarahio dhaṇarahio saaṇamajjhavāso vva
riuriddhidaṃsaṇaṃ miva dūsahaṇīo tuha vioo
ko ttha jaammi samattho thaïuṃ vitthiṇṇaṇimmaluttuṃgaṃ
hiaaṃ tujjha ṇarāhiva gaaṇaṃ va paohare mottuṃ
āaṇṇei aḍaaṇā kuḍuṃgaheṭṭhammi diṇṇasaṃkeā
aggapaapelliāṇaṃ mammaraaṃ juṇṇapattāṇaṃ
ahileṃti surahiṇīsasiaparimalāvaddhamaṃḍalaṃ bhamarā
amuṇiacaṃdaparihavaṃ apuvvakamalaṃ muhaṃ tissā
dhīrāvalaṃvirīa vi guruaṇapurao tumammi volīṇe
paḍio se acchiṇimīlaṇeṇa pamhaṭṭhio vāho
bharimo se saaṇaparaṃmuhīa vialaṃtamāṇapasarāi
kaïavasuttuvvattaṇathaṇaalasappellaṇasuhelliṃ
phaggucchavaṇiddosaṃ keṇa vi kaddamapasāhaṇaṃ diṇṇaṃ
thaṇaalasamuhapaloṭṭaṃtaseadhoaṃ kiṇo dhuasi
kiṃ ṇa bhaṇio si vālaa gāmaṇidhūāi guruaṇasamakkhaṃ
aṇimisam īsīsi valaṃtavaaṇaṇaaṇaddhatiṭṭhehiṃ
ṇaaṇabbhaṃtaragholaṃtavāhabharamaṃtharāi diṭṭhīe
puṇaruttapeccharīe vālaa kiṃ jaṃ ṇa bhaṇio si
jo sīsammi viiṇṇo majjha juāṇehi gaṇavaī āsi
taṃ cia eṇhiṃ paṇamāmi haajare hohi saṃtuṭṭhā
aṃtohuttaṃ ḍajjhaï jāāsuṇṇe ghare haliaütto
ukkhāaṇihāṇāi va ramiaṭṭhāṇāi pecchaṃto
ṇiddābhaṃgo āvaṃḍurattaṇaṃ dīharā a ṇīsāsā
jāaṃti jassa virahe teṇa samaṃ kīriso māṇo
teṇa ṇa marāmi maṇṇūhi pūriā ajja jeṇa re suhaa
taggaamaṇā maraṃtī mā tujjha puṇo vi laggissaṃ
avarajjhasu vīsaddhaṃ savvaṃ te suhaa visahimo amhe
guṇaṇibbharammi hiae pattia dosā ṇa māaṃti
bhariuccaraṃtapasariapiasaṃbharaṇapisuṇo varāīe
parivāho via dukkhassa vahaï ṇaaṇaṭṭhio vāho
jaṃ jaṃ karesi jaṃ jaṃ jaṃpasi jaha jaha tumaṃ ṇiacchesi
taṃ tam aṇusikkhirīe dīho diaho ṇa saṃpaḍaï
bhaṃḍaṃtīa taṇāiṃ sottuṃ diṇṇāi jāi pahiassa
tāi ccea pahāe ajjā āaḍḍhaï ruaṃtī
vasaṇammi aṇuvviggā vihavammi agavviā bhae dhīrā
hoṃti ahiṇṇasahāvā samesu visamesu sappurisā
ajja sahi keṇa gose kaṃ pi maṇe vallahaṃ bharaṃteṇa
amhaṃ maaṇasarāhaahiaavaṇapphoḍaṇaṃ gīaṃ
uṭṭhaṃtamahāraṃbhe thaṇae daṭṭhūṇa muddhavahuāe
osaṇṇakavolāe ṇīsasiaṃ paḍhamaghariṇīe
garuachuhāuliassa vi vallahakariṇīmuhaṃ bharaṃtassa
saraso muṇālakavalo gaassa hatthe ccia milāṇo
pasia pie kā kuviā suaṇu tumaṃ paraaṇammi ko kovo
ko hu paro ṇāha tumaṃ kīsa aüṇṇāṇa me sattī
ehisi tumaṃ ti ṇimisaṃ va jaggiaṃ jāmiṇīa paḍhamaddhaṃ
sesaṃ saṃtāvaparavvasāi varisaṃ va volīṇaṃ
avalaṃvaha mā saṃkaha ṇa imā gahalaṃghiā paribbhamaï
atthakkagajjiubbhaṃtahitthahiaā pahiajāā
kesararaavicchaḍḍe maaraṃdo hoi jettio kamale
jaï bhamara tettio aṇṇahiṃ pi tā sohasi bhamaṃto
pecchaṃti aṇimisacchā pahiā haliassa piṭṭhapaṃḍuriaṃ
dhūaṃ duddhasamudduttaraṃtalacchiṃ via saaṇhā
kassa bharasi tti bhaṇie ko me atthi tti jaṃpamāṇīe
uvviggaroirīe amhe vi ruāviā tīe
pāapaḍiaṃ ahavve kiṃ dāṇi ṇa uṭṭhavesi bhattāraṃ
eaṃ cia avasāṇaṃ dūraṃ pi gaassa pemmassa
taḍaviṇihiaggahatthā vāritaraṃgehi gholiraṇiaṃvā
sālūrī paḍiviṃve purisāaṃti vva paḍihāi
sikkariamaṇiamuhaveviāi dhuahatthasiṃjiavvāi
sikkhaṃtu voḍahīo kusuṃbha tumhaṃ pasāeṇa
jettiamettā racchā ṇiaṃva kaha tettio ṇa jāo si
jeṇa chivijjaï guruaṇalajjosario vi so suhao
maragaasūīviddhaṃ va mottiaṃ piaï āaaggīvo
moro pāusaāle taṇaggalaggaṃ uaaviṃduṃ
ajjāi ṇīlakaṃcuabhariuvvariaṃ vihāi thaṇavaṭṭaṃ
jalabhariajalaharaṃtaradaruggaaṃ caṃdaviṃvaṃ va
rāaviruddhaṃ va kahaṃ pahio pahiassa sāhaï sasaṃkaṃ
jatto amvāṇa dalaṃ tatto daraṇiggaaṃ kiṃ pi
dhaṇṇā tā mahilāo jā daïaṃ siviṇae vi pecchaṃti
ṇidda ccia teṇa viṇā ṇa ei kā pecchae siviṇaṃ
parihariakaṇaakuṃḍalagaṃḍatthalamaṇaharesu savaṇesu
aṇṇua samaavaseṇaṃ parihijjaï tālaveṃṭajuaṃ
majjhaṇhapatthiassa vi gimhe pahiassa haraï saṃtāvaṃ
hiaaṭṭhiajāāmuhamaaṃkajoṇhājalappavaho
bhaṇa ko ṇa rūsaï jaṇo patthijjaṃto adesaālammi
raïvāvaḍā ruvaṃtaṃ piaṃ pi puttaṃ savaï māā
ḍajjhasi ḍajjhasu kutthasi kutthasu aha phuḍasi hiaa tā phuḍasu
taha vi parisesio ccia so khu mae galiasabbhāvo
daṭṭhūṇa raṃdatuṃḍaggaṇiggaaṃ ṇiasuassa dāḍhaggaṃ
bhoṃḍī viṇā vi kajjeṇa gāmaṇiaḍe jave caraï
helākaraggakaḍḍhiajalarikkaṃ sāaraṃ paāsaṃto
jaaï aṇiggahavaḍavaggibhariagaaṇo gaṇāhivaī
eeṇa ccia kaṃkelli tujjha taṃ ṇa tthi jaṃ ṇa pajjattaṃ
uvamijjaï jaṃ tuha pallaveṇa varakāmiṇīhattho
rasia viaḍḍha vilāsia samaaṇṇua saccaaṃ asoo si
varajuvaïcalaṇakamalāhao vi jaṃ viasasi saaṇhaṃ
valiṇo vāāvaṃhe cojjaṃ ṇiuṇattaṇaṃ ca paaḍaṃto
surasatthakaāṇaṃdo vāmaṇarūvo harī jaaï
vijjhāvijjaï jalaṇo gahavaïdhūāi vitthaasiho vi
aṇumaraṇaghaṇāliṃgaṇapiaamasuhasijjiraṃgīe
jāramasāṇasamubbhavabhūisuhapphaṃsasijjiraṃgīe
ṇa samappaï ṇavakāvāliṇīa uddhūlaṇāraṃbho
ekko paṇhaaï thaṇo vīo pulaei ṇahamuhālihio
puttassa piaamassa a majjhaṇisaṇṇāi ghariṇīa
ettāi ccia mohaṃ jaṇei vālattaṇe vi vaṭṭaṃtī
gāmaṇidhuā visalaa vva vaḍḍhiā kāhii aṇatthaṃ
apahuppaṃtaṃ mahimaṃḍalammi ṇahasaṃṭhiaṃ ciraṃ hariṇo
tārāupphappaaraṃciaṃ va taïaṃ paaṃ ṇamaha
suppaü taïo vi gao jāmo tti sahīu kīsa maṃ bhaṇaha
sehāliāṇa gaṃdho ṇa dei sottuṃ suaha tumhe
kaha so ṇa saṃbharijjaï jo me taha saṃṭhiāi aṃgāiṃ
ṇivvattie vi surae ṇijjhāaï suraarasio vva
sukkhaṃtavahalakaddamaghammavisūraṃtakamaḍhapāḍhīṇaṃ
diṭṭhaṃ aïṭṭhaüvvaṃ kāleṇa talaṃ taḍāassa
coriaraasaddhāluṇi mā putti bhammasu aṃdhaārammi
ahiaaraṃ lakkhijjasi tamabharie dīvaasiha vva
vāhittā paḍivaaṇaṃ ṇa dei rūsei ekkamekkassa
asaī kajjeṇa viṇā palippamāṇe ṇaīkacche
āma asaï mha osara païvvae ṇa tuha maïliaṃ gottaṃ
kiṃ uṇa jaṇassa jāa vva caṃḍilaṃ tā ṇa kāmemo
ṇiddaṃ lahaṃti kahiaṃ suṇaṃti khaliakkharaṃ ṇa jaṃpaṃti
jāhi ṇa diṭṭho si tumaṃ tāo ccia suhaa suhiāo
vālaa tumāi diṇṇaṃ kaṇṇe kāūṇa vorasaṃghāḍiṃ
lajjāluiṇī vi vahū gharaṃ gaā gāmaracchāe
aha so vilakkhahiao mae ahavvāi agahiāṇuṇao
paravajjaṇaccirīhiṃ tumhehi uvekkhio ṇiṃto
dīsaṃto ṇaaṇasuho ṇivvudijaṇaṇo karehi vi chivaṃto
abbhatthio ṇa labbhaï caṃdo vva pio kalāṇilao
je līṇabhamarabharabhaggagocchaā āsi ṇaïaḍucchaṃge
kāleṇa vaṃjulā piavaassa te khaṇṇuā jāā
khaṇabhaṃgureṇa pemmeṇa māuā dūmia mhi ettāhe
siviṇaaṇihilaṃbheṇa va diṭṭhapaṇaṭṭheṇa loammi
cāo sahāvasaralaṃ vicchuhaï saraṃ guṇammi ṇivaḍaṃtaṃ
vaṃkassa ujjuassa a saṃvaṃdho kiṃ ciraṃ hoi
paḍhamaṃ vāmaṇavihiṇā pacchā hu kao viaṃbhamāṇeṇa
thaṇajualeṇa imīe mahumahaṇeṇa vva valivaṃdho
mālaïkusumāi kuluṃciūṇa mā jāṇa ṇivvuo sisiro
kāavvā ajja vi ṇigguṇāṇa kuṃdāṇa sāmiddhī
tuṃgāṇa visesaṇiraṃtarāṇa sarasavaṇaladdhasohāṇaṃ
kaakajjāṇa bhaḍāṇa va thaṇāṇa paḍaṇaṃ pi ramaṇijjaṃ
parimalaṇasuhā garuā aladdhavivarā salakkhaṇāharaṇā
thaṇaā kavvālāa vva kassa hiae ṇa laggaṃti
khippaï hāro thaṇamaṃḍalāhi taruṇīhi ramaṇapariraṃbhe
acciaguṇā vi guṇiṇo lahaṃti lahuattaṇaṃ kāle
aṇṇo ko vi sahāvo vammahasihiṇo halā haāsassa
vijjhāi ṇīrasāṇaṃ hiae sarasāṇa pajjalaï
taha tassa māṇaparivaḍḍhiassa cirapaṇaavaddhamūlassa
māmi paḍaṃtassa suo saddo vi ṇa pemmarukkhassa
pāapaḍio ṇa gaṇio piaṃ bhaṇaṃto vi appiaṃ bhaṇio
vaccaṃto vi ṇa ruddho bhaṇa kassa kae kao māṇo
pusaï khaṇaṃ dhuaï khaṇaṃ papphoḍaï takkhaṇaṃ aāṇaṃtī
muddhavahū thaṇavaṭṭe diṇṇaṃ daïeṇa ṇakkhavaaṃ
vāsāratte uṇṇaapaohare jovvaṇe vva volīṇe
paḍhamekkakāsakusumaṃ dīsaï paliaṃ va dharaṇīe
kattha gaaṃa raïviṃvaṃ kattha paṇaṭṭhāu caṃdatārāu
gaaṇe valāavaṃtiṃ kālo horaṃ va kaṭṭhei
aviralapaḍaṃtaṇavajaladhārārajjughaḍiaṃ paatteṇa
apahutto ukkhiviuṃ rasaï va meho mahiṃ uaha
o hiaa ohidiahaṃ taïā paḍivajjiūṇa daïassa
atthakkāula vīsaṃbhaghāi kiṃ taï samāḍhattaṃ
jo vi ṇa āṇaï tassa vi kahei bhaggāi teṇa valaāiṃ
aïujjuā varāī ahava pio se haāsāe
sāmāi garuajovvaṇavisesabharie kavolamūlammi
pijjaï ahomuheṇa va kaṇṇavaaṃseṇa lāvaṇṇaṃ
seulliasavvaṃgī gottaggahaṇeṇa tassa suhaassa
dūiṃ appāheṃtī tassea gharaṃgaṇaṃ pattā
jammaṃtare vi calaṇe jīeṇaṃ maaṇa tujjha accissaṃ
jaï taṃ pi teṇa vāṇeṇa vijjhase jeṇa haṃ viddhā
ṇiavakkhāroviadehabhāraṇiuṇaṃ rasaṃ lahaṃteṇa
viasāviūṇa pijjaï mālaïkaliā mahuareṇa
kuruṇāho via pahio dummijjaï māhavassa milieṇa
bhīmeṇa jahicchāe dāhiṇavāeṇa chippaṃto
jāva ṇa kosaviāsaṃ pāvaï īsīsi mālaīkaliā
maaraṃdapāṇalohilla bhamara tāva ccia malesi
akaaṇṇua tujjha kae pāusarāīsu jaṃ mae khuṇṇaṃ
uppekkhāmi alajjira ajja vi taṃ gāmacikkhillaṃ
rehaï galaṃtakesakkhalaṃtakuṃḍalalalaṃtahāralaā
addhuppaïā vijjāhari vva purisāirī vālā
jaï bhamasi bhamasu emea kaṇha sohaggagavviro goṭṭhe
mahilāṇaṃ dosaguṇe viāriuṃ jaï khamo si tumaṃ
saṃjhāsamae jalapūriaṃjaliṃ vihaḍiekkavāmaaraṃ
gorīa kosapāṇujjaaṃ va pamahāhivaṃ ṇamaha
gāmaṇiṇo savvāsu vi piāsu aṇumaraṇagahiavesāsu
mammaccheesu vi vallahāi uvariṃ valaï diṭṭhī
māmi sarisakkharāṇa vi atthi viseso paaṃpiavvāṇaṃ
ṇehamaïāṇam aṇṇo aṇṇo uvarohamaïāṇaṃ
hiaāhiṃto pasaraṃti jāi aṇṇāi tāi vaaṇāi
osarasu kiṃ imehiṃ aharaṃtaramettabhaṇiehiṃ
kaha sā sohaggaguṇaṃ mae samaṃ vahaï ṇigghiṇa tumammi
jīa harijjaï ṇāmaṃ hariūṇa a dijjae majjha
sahi sāhasu sabbhāveṇa pucchimo kiṃ asesamahilāṇaṃ
vaḍḍhaṃti karattha ccia valaā daïe paütthammi
bhamaï parido visūraï ukkhiviuṃ se karaṃ pasārei
kariṇo paṃkakkhuttassa ṇehaṇialāviā kariṇī

div.head: 455. (466 γψ, 467 πIn γ bereits auch schon, ebenso wie in ξ als 197, s. oben p. 71 bei v. 195; daher hier bloss: ratikelī 'ti vyākhyātā gāthā. S. im Uebrigen A 48 Abh. p. 219., 490 χ, 462 R; 2 TS.)

lg.l: raïkelihiahiyaṇiaṃsaṇaṇiasaṇaṇivasaṇaṇiaṃsaṇaṇiyaṃsaṇanitaṃvasyanivasanakarakisalaaruddhakisalayaruddhajualaṇiruddhoṇaaṇaṇayaṇajualassa
ruddassa taïataïyaṇaaṇaṃṇayaṇaṃṇaaṇi pavvaïpabbaïpavvaïgorīpārvatīpariuṃviaṃuṃviyaṃcuṃviaṃcuṃbiaṃcuṃbiyaṃ jaaïjayaï

div.head: Verschämtheit und Geistesgegenwart [s. v. 351. 459].
div.p: Glückauf dem von Pārvatī geküssten dritten Auge des Rudra, dessen anderes Augenpaar sie mit ihren Sprosshänden zudeckte, als sie im Liebesspiel ihres Gewandes beraubt ward.

samāne 'pi sthaganavyāpāre lokottareṇaitat sthaganam iti jayati ity abhivyajyate πξ, — kāpi (kācit χ) sakhyāḥ śikṣārthaṃ pārvatyā lajjāyām api snehābhivyaktivaidagdhyaṃ varṇayati (āha χ) χG, — jayati jayam utpādayati tiṣṭhatīty arthaḥ χ, — dvābhyāṃ netrābhyāṃ karasparśa eva labdhaḥ tṛtīyanayanena tu samaṃtāc cuṃvanena gauryā adhararaso labdha iti tṛtīyanayanasyotkṛṣṭatayā jaya iti (tīti Cod.); yadvā gauryā cuṃvanavyājāt tṛtīyanayanasyāpi sthaganād ,,utpannamatayo na kṛchreṣv avasīdaṃtīti'' ti sūcitaṃ; ... yadvā, nagnastrīdarśanaṃ trinayanasyāpi niṣiddhaṃ, tad āha: saṃpattiṃ icchadbhir nagnastrīdarśanaṃ pariharaṇīyam iti; tathācoktaṃ: araṃ (annaṃ?) bhu(ṃ)kte ciraṃ snāti datta puṣpaṃ na jighrati | na paśyati striyaṃ nagnām aśriyas te na mānavā iti lakṣmīvacanaṃ S; — zu ṇiaṃsaṇa für nivasana s. 125. 351.

lg.l: dhāvaï purao pāsesu bhamaï diṭṭhīpahammi saṃṭhāi

div.head: Rasche Auskunft [s. 351. 455]
div.p: Sittige Frauen bedecken schämig beim Ende der Lust, wenn sie ihr Gewand nicht erreichen können, ihr Hüfte rasch durch eine Umarmung des Liebsten.
ḍhakkaṃti āchādayaṃtī 'ty arthe deśī χ; s. v. 314; — kā 'pi kulavadhūvṛttaṃ śikṣayituṃ sakhīm āha G.

div.head: Só abgehärmt!
div.p: Sogar die sehr harte (zum Zorne geneigte) Schwiegermutter musste über ihre Schwiegertochter, deren Gatte in der Ferne, weinen, als ihr alle beide Armbänder entglitten, während sie sich neigte, ihr zu Füssen zu fallen.

.. valayayor iti sati saptamī πGS, — proṣitapatikāyā virahāvasthāṃ sakhī tatkāṃtasamīpagāminaṃ pathikam āha; evam iyaṃ matputrakṛte kṛśā jātā yenā 'nayā matpādavaṃdanāvanatayā valayapāto 'pi na jñāta ity ālokya niṣṭhurā 'pi śvaśrū ruroda G (von evam an ählich π); sakhyā lekhagāthā T (ein Brief, den die Freundin an den Abwesenden schreibt, um ihn zur Rückkehr anzutreiben).

div.head: Vom Gefühl übermannt.
div.p: Als der Wandrer beim Abschied des Antlitz seiner Gattin erblassen sah, brachte er, von KummerZärtlichkeit πST. gefesselt, es nicht fertig, zu gehen.

āpṛchanaṃ gaṃtum anujānīhīti praśnaḥ G, — āuchaṇaṃ āgaṃtuṃ anujānīhi 'ti praśne deśī χ, — na tiṇṇam (oder ṇa iṇṇaṃ) scheint mir entschieden besser als na iṭṭham; — zu ṇiach s. 238; — ṇibhālaaṃta γ ist im Uebrigen auch eine gute Lesart, cf. Mālav. 5, 9 (Tullberg); Bollensen (5, 11) hat nijjhāaṃtī vorgezogen; wenn er dabei p. 123 bhālay als eine unregelmässige Bildung des Causativs, wie pālay für pāyay, also offenbar aus bhā erklärt, und ferner als ,,im Sanskrit unbekannt'' bezeichnet, so ist theils jene Erklärung schwerlich richtig (auch pālay gehört nicht zu pā, sondern steht für pāray aus par), theils bezeugt das Pet. W. die Existenz der ja auch im Dhātupāṭha in der Bedeutung nirūpane anerkannten Wurzel bhal auch für das Danskrit (Chāndogyop. etc.); und zwar erscheint sie daselbst nicht blos mit ni, sondern auch mit sam verbunden.

div.head: Da wird Alles gleich an die grosse Glocke gehängt!
div.p: Um der verwünschten Leute willen, die auf (jeden) Nadelstich eine Mörserkeule werfen, habe ich den Liebsten, obschon er im selben Dorfe wohnt, nicht einmal mit ganz gewöhnlichen (geschweige denn: mit verliebten) Augen (an-)gesehen.

div.head: Allzu scharf macht schartig!
div.p: Ganz wahr, nach jedem Zank sind die Freuden der Lust immer wieder neu! Langes Schmollen aber, o Schmollende! vernichtet die Liebe.

aïrā hohiṃti pahā maṇorahāṇaṃ pi dullaṃghā
aïdīharāi vahue sīse dīsaṃti vaṃsavattāi
bhaṇie bhaṇāmi attā tumhāṇa vi paṃḍarā puṭṭhī
atthakkarūsaṇaṃ khaṇapasijjaṇaṃ aliavaaṇaṇivvaṃdho
ummaccharasaṃtāvo puttaa paavī siṇehassa
pijjaï kaṇṇaṃjalihiṃ jaṇaravamiliaṃ pi tujjha saṃlāvaṃ
duddhaṃ jalasammiliaṃ sā vālā rāahaṃsi vva
aï ujjue ṇa lajjasi pucchijjaṃtī piassa cariāiṃ
savvaṃgasurahiṇo maruvaassa kiṃ kusumariddhīhi
muddhe apattiaṃtī pavālaaṃkuraaṇiddhalohiae
ṇiddhoadhāurāe kīsa sahatthe puṇo dhuasi
ua siṃdhavapavvaasacchahāi dhuatūlapuṃjasarisāiṃ
sohaṃti suaṇu mukkoaāi sarae siabbhāiṃ
āucchaṃti sirehi vivaliehi ua khaḍiehi ṇijjaṃtā
ṇippacchimavaliapaloiehi mahisā kuḍaṃgāi
pusasu muhaṃ tā puttia vāhoaraṇaṃ visesaramaṇijjaṃ
mā eaṃ cia muhamaṃḍaṇaṃ ti so kāhii puṇo vi
majjhe paaṇuapaṃkaṃ avahovāsesu sāṇacikkhillaṃ
gāmassa sīsasīmaṃtaaṃ va racchāmuhaṃ jāaṃ
avaraṇhāgaajāmāuassa viuṇei mohaṇukkaṃṭhaṃ
vahuāi gharapaloharamajjaṇapisuṇo valaasaddo
jujjhacaveḍāmoḍiajajjarakaṇṇassa juṇṇamallassa
kacchāvaṃdho ccia bhīrumallahiaaṃ samukkhaṇaï
āṇaṃdaṃtena tumaṃ païṇo pahaeṇa paḍahasaddeṇa
malli ṇa lajjasi ṇaccasi dohagge pāaḍijjaṃte
mā vaccaha vīsaṃbhaṃ imāṇa vahucāḍuammaṇiuṇāṇaṃ
ṇivvattiakajjaparammuhāṇa suṇaāṇa va khalāṇaṃ
aṇṇaggāmapaütthā kaḍḍhaṃtī maṃḍalāṇa riṃcholiṃ
akkhaṃḍiasohaggā varisasaaṃ jiaü me suṇiā
saccaṃ sāhasu deara taha taha caḍuāraeṇa suṇaeṇa
ṇivvattiakajjaparammuhattaṇaṃ sikkhiaṃ katto
ṇippaṇṇasassariddhī sacchaṃdaṃ gāi pāmaro sarae
daliaṇavasālitaṃḍuladhavalamiaṃkāsu rāīsu
alihijjaï paṃkaale halālicalaṇeṇa kalamagovīe
keārasoaruṃbhaṇataṃsaṭṭhiakomalo calaṇo
diahe diahe sūsaï saṃkeaabhaṃgavaḍḍhiāsaṃkā
āvaṃḍuroṇaamuhī kalameṇa samaṃ kalamagovī
ṇavakammieṇa ua pāmareṇa daṭṭhūṇa pāuhārīo
mottavve jottaapaggahammi avahāsiṇī mukkā
daṭṭhūṇa hariadīhaṃ gose saṃḍhāṇa jūrae halio
asaīrahassamaggaṃ tusāradhavale tilacchette
saṃkellio vva ṇijjaï khaṃḍaṃ khaṃḍaṃ kao vva pīo vva
vāsāgamammi maggo gharahuttamuheṇa pahieṇa
saṃjhāgahiajalaṃjalipaḍimāsaṃkaṃtagorimuhakamalaṃ
aliaṃ cia phurioṭṭhaṃ vialiamaṃtaṃ haraṃ ṇamaha
ia sirihālaviraïe pāuakavvammi sattasae
sattamasaaṃ samattaṃ gāhāṇa sahāvaramaṇijjaṃ
eṇhiṃ vārei jaṇo taïā mūillao kahiṃ va gao
jāhe visaṃ va jāaṃ savvaṃgapaholiraṃ pemmaṃ
kaha taṃ pi tui ṇa ṇāaṃ jaha sā āsaṃdiāṇa vahuāṇaṃ
kāūṇa uccavaciaṃ tuha daṃsaṇalehaḍā paḍiā
corāṇa kāmuāṇa a pāmarapahiāṇa kukkuro vaḍaï
re ramaha vahaha vāhayaha ettha taṇuāae raaṇī
aṇṇoṇṇakalakkhaṃtarapesiamelīṇadiṭṭhipasarāiṃ
do ccia maṇṇe kaabhaṃḍaṇāi samaaṃ pahasiāiṃ
suhaa iaṃ majjha sahī tujjha vioeṇa dhāriuṃ pāṇe
savvaha cia ṇa samattha tti vujjhiuṃ virama gamaṇāo
dhaṇṇā vahiraṃdharaā te ccia jīaṃti māṇuse loe
ṇa suṇaṃti pisuṇavaaṇaṃ khalāṇa addhiṃ ṇa pekkhaṃti
gāmāruha mhi gāme vasāmi ṇaaraṭṭhiiṃ ṇa āṇāmi
ṇāariāṇaṃ païṇo haremi jā homi sā homi
osara rottuṃ cia ṇimmiāi mā pusasu me haacchīiṃ
daṃsaṇamettummaïehi jehi sīlaṃ tuha ṇa ṇāaṃ
raṇaraṇaasuṇṇahiao ciṃtaṃto virahaduvvalaṃ jāaṃ
amuṇiaṇiavasahī so volīṇo gāmamajjheṇa
ettha caütthaṃ viramaï gāhāṇa saaṃ sahāvaramaṇijjaṃ
soūṇa jaṃ ṇa laggaï hiae mahurattaṇeṇa amiaṃ pi
eso kaïṇāmaṃkiagāhāpaḍivaddhavaḍḍhiāmoo
sattasaao samatto sālāhaṇaviraïo koso
suaṇo ṇi dīsaï ccia khalabahula ḍaḍḍhajīaloammi
jaha kāasaṃkulā taha ṇa haṃsaparivāriā puhavī
jaṃ mucchiāi ṇa suo kalaṃvagaṃdheṇa taṃ guṇa paḍiaṃ
iarā gajjiasaddo jīeṇa viṇā ṇa volaṃto
pīṇapaoharalaggaṃ disāṇa pavasaṃtajalaasamaaviiṇṇaṃ
sohaggapaḍhamaïṇhaṃ paccāaï saraṇahapahaṃ iṃdadhaṇuṃ
ettī mattammi thavā puttīmattammi laaṇā bhattī
agaīa avatthāe diahāiṃ bhittaraṃ taraï
jaṃ asaraṇo vva ḍaḍḍho gāmo sāhīṇavahujuāṇo vi
saṃbhamavisaṃṭhulāṇaṃ taṃ duccariaṃ tuha thaṇāṇaṃ
so vi juā māṇahaṇo tumaṃ pi māṇassa asahaṇā putti
mattacchaleṇa gammaü surāi uvariṃ pusasu hatthaṃ
keaïgaṃdhahagavviāraaraṃjiāddaṇehiṃ
kaṃṭhaasavalitaṇutava chaḍḍiabhavalāṇaṃ
aha suaï diṇṇapaḍivakkhaveaṇā pasiḍhilehi aṃgehiṃ
ṇivvattiasuraarasāṇuvaṃdhasuhaṇibbharaṃ vahuā
jaï teṇa tujjha vaaṇaṃ ṇa kaaṃ maha kāraṇeṇa a haāse
sā kīsa khaṃḍiataḍaṃ ṇiāharaṃ dūi dummesi
nirmalagaganataḍāge tārāgaṇakusumabhitetimire
bhikaravobālaṃ carati mṛgāṃko marāla iva
diṭṭhāi jaṃ ṇa diṭṭho saralasahāvāi jaṃ ca ṇā 'lavio
uvaāro jaṃ ṇa kao taṃ cia kaliaṃ chaïllehiṃ
aviralaṇiggaapulao paaḍiakaṃpo pamukkasikkāro
hemaṃte pahiajaṇo suraāsatto vva paḍihāi
vahuvihavilāsabharie surae labbhaṃti jāi sokkhāiṃ
virahammi tāi piasahi khāuggiṇṇāi kīraṃti
seullaṇiaṃvālaggasaṇhasicaassa maggam alahaṃto
sahi mohagholiro ajja tassa hasio mae hattho
dūīkajjāaṇṇaṇapaḍirohaṃ mā karehii imaṃ ti
utthaṃghei va turiaṃ tissā kaṇṇuppalaṃ pulao
mā vaccasu vīsaṃbhaṃ puttaa caḍuārao imo loo
sūīveho kaṇṇassa peccha kiṃ ṇijjaï pamāṇaṃ
amiamaaṃ cia hiaaṃ hatthā taṇhāharā saaṇhāṇaṃ
caṃdamuhi kattha ṇivasaï amittadahaṇo tuha paāvo
diṭṭhīa jāva pasaro tāva tumaṃ suhaa ṇivvuiṃ kuṇasi
volīṇadaṃsaṇo taha tavesi jaha houdiṭṭheṇa
gajjaṃti ghaṇā paṃthāṇo vahutaṇā a pasāriā sariā
ajja vi ujjuasīle païṇo maggaṃ paloesi
uṇho tti samatthijjaï ḍāheṇa saroruhāṇa hemaṃto
cariehi ṇajjaï jaṇo saṃgovaṃto vi appāṇaṃ
uvahāriāi samaaṃ piṃḍāre ua kahaṃ kuṇaṃtammi
ṇavavahuāi sarosaṃ savva ccia vachaā mukkā
pajjāliūṇa aggiṃ muheṇa puttia kiṇo samosarasi
thaṇaalasapaḍiapaḍimā phuraṃti ṇa chivaṃti te jālā
aggiṃ abbhuttaṃtīa putti paḍimāgaā kavolammi
kaṇṇālaṃviapallavalacchiṃ saṃdhei te jālā
kaha de dhūmaṃdhāre abbhuttaṇaṃ aggiṇo samappihaï
muhakamalacuṃvaṇālehaḍammi pāsaṭṭhie diare
āaṃvacchaṃ paalaṃtavāham āvaddhathaṇaharukkaṃpaṃ
asamattaṃ cia ciṭṭhaü sihiṇo abbhuttaṇam iṇaṃ te
chaṇapāhuṇie 'tti kiṇo ajja vi ṇaṃ bhaṇaha aṃgasaṃtāvaṃ
jāā amha gharillaaguṇeṇa gharasāmiṇi ccea
vaṇṇakkamaṃ ṇa āṇasi ṭhāṇavisuddhī vi de ṇa ṇivvaḍiā
cittaara taha vi maggasi bhoiṇikuḍḍammi ālihiuṃ
vialiakalākalāvo caṃdo mittassa maṃḍalaṃ visaï
ṇissaraï tādiso ccia gaavihavaṃ ko samuddharaï
ṇā 'haṃ dūī suṃdara tīe pio si ṇa amha vāvāro
sā maraï tujjha virahe eaṃ dhammakkharaṃ bhaṇimo
jo hoi rasāisao suviṇaṭṭhāṇaṃ vi puṃḍaïcchūṇaṃ
katto so hoi raso mohāsāṇaṃ aṇicchūṇaṃ
jaï vi hu dilliṃdiliā taha vi hu mā putti ṇaggiā bhamasu
cheā ṇaarajuāṇo māaṃ dhūāi lakkhaṃti
gaagaṃḍaagavaasarabhaserihasaddūlarikkhajāīṇaṃ
thaṇaā vāhavahūe abhaaṃ dāuṃ va ṇikkaṃtā
bhiuḍīa puloissaṃ ṇibbhacchissaṃ paraṃmuhī hossaṃ
jaṃ bhaṇaha taṃ karissaṃ sahīu jaï taṃ ṇa pecchissaṃ
jaṃ keaveṇa pemmaṃ jaṃ ca valā jaṃ ca atthaloheṇa
jaṃ uvarohaṇimittaṃ ṇamoṇamo tassa pemmassa
kassa ṇa saddhā garuattaṇammi païṇo pasāamāṇassa
jaï māṇabhaṃjaṇīo ṇa hoṃti hemaṃtarāīo
avvo tahiṃtahiṃ cia gaaṇe bhamiūṇa vīsamaṃteṇa
vohittavāaseṇa vva hāsiā ḍaḍḍhapemmeṇa
de ā dumasu tumaṃ ciya mā parihara putti paḍhamadumiyaṃ ti
kiṃ kuḍḍaṃ ṇiamuhaaṃdakaṃtidumiaṃ ṇa lakkhesi
vijjaṃti taṇuṃ uvaṇeṃti veaṇaṃ ṇeyatāṇa khayamagge
abbo aïṭṭhapuvvo aṇaṃgabāṇāṇa māhappo
āmoḍaūṇa balāu hatthaṃ majjhaṃ gao si bho pahia
hiaāu jaï a ṇīhasi sāmatthaṃ tujjha jāṇissaṃ
saddhā me tujjha piyattaṇassa ahayaṃ tu taṃ ṇa yāṇāmi
de pasiya tumaṃ ciya sikkhavesu jaha te piyā homi
pemmummaïyāi mae uvaūḍho haliyaüttabuddhīe
phaṃsemi jāva pharuso taṇapuriso gāmasīmāe
be maggā dharaṇiyale māṇiṇi māṇoṇṇayāṇa purisāṇa
ahavā pāvaṃti siriṃ ahava bhamaṃtā samappaṃti
katto kamalāṇa raī katto kumuyāṇa sīalo caṃdo
taha sajjaṇāṇa ṇeho ṇa calaï dūraṭṭhiāṇaṃ pi
hā hā kiṃ teṇa kayaṃ mālaïvirahammi putti bhasaleṇaṃ
kaṃkellikusumamajjhe jalaṇo tti samappio appā
ḍhaṃkharaseso vi hu mahuareṇa mukko ṇa mālaīviḍavo
daraviyasiyakaliyāmoyabahalimaṃ saṃbharaṃteṇa
samuhāgayavolaṃtammi sā tume aghaḍiyaṃgasaṃṭhāṇā
ruṃdaṃ vi gāmaracchaṃ ṇiṃdaï taṇuaṃ ca appāṇaṃ
samam acchaṃti ṇiattaṃti pasariyā raṇaraṇaṃti taddhiyahaṃ
calacitta tujjha laggā maṇorahā tīĕ hiyayammi
ḍahiūṇa sayalaraṇṇaṃ aggī samavisamalaṃghaṇuvvāyo
taḍalaṃbaṃtataṇehiṃ tisiya vva ṇaïṃ samosaraï
sa cciya rāmeu tumaṃ paṃḍiya ṇiccaṃ alaṃ mha ramieṇa
sabbhāvabāhirāiṃ jā jāṇaï aṭṭamaṭṭāiṃ
raaṇāyarassa sāhemi ṇammae ajja mukkadakkhiṇṇā
veḍisalayāharaṃteṇa miliyā jaṃ si pūreṇa
rakkhaï aṇaṇṇahiyao jīvaṃ piva mahuaro payatteṇa
daraṇeṃtadīvidāḍhaggasacchahaṃ mālaīmaülaṃ
taha ṇehalāliyāṇa vi avāhirillāṇa sayalakajjesu
jaṃ kasaṇaṃ hoi muhaṃ taṃ bhaṇṇaï kiṃ paīvāṇaṃ
tisiyā piyaü tti mao mao vi tisio maī kareūṇa
iya mayamihuṇaṃ tisiyaṃ piyaï ṇa salilaṃ siṇeheṇa
tuha sāmali dhavalacalaṃtataralatikkhaggaloyaṇabaleṇa
mayaṇo puṇo vi icchaï hareṇa saha viggahāraṃbhaṃ
suhaya suhaṃ ciya kuḍali vva pehuṇo ṇiggayassa caḍuvassa
jaṇaraṃjaṇiggaho te gharammi suṇaho atihivaṃto
ṇivaḍihisi suṇṇahiyae jalaharajalapaṃkilammi maggammi
uppekkhāgayapiyayamahatthe hatthaṃ pasāreṃtī
ucchaṃgiyāĕ païṇā ahisāraṇapaṃkamaliṇaperaṃte
āsaṇṇapariyaṇo via sea cciya dhuvaï se pāe
jaha laṃghesi paravaïṃ niyayavaïṃ bharasahaṃ pi mottūṇaṃ
taha maṇṇe kohalie ajjaṃ kallaṃ pi phuṭṭihasi
aṇusoyaï haliyabahū raïkiraṇoluggapaṃḍuracchāyaṃ
raṇṇuṃduradaṃtukkhuttavisamavaliyaṃ tilacchettaṃ
ovālaammi sīāluāṇa vaïmūlam ullihaṃtāṇaṃ
diṃbhāṇa kaliṃcayavāvaḍāṇa suṇṇo jalaï aggī
mā mā muya parihāsaṃ deara aṇahoraṇā varāī sā
sīyammi vi pāsijjaï puṇo vi esiṃ kuṇasu chāyaṃ
kiṃ tassa pāraeṇaṃ kim aggiṇā kiṃ ca gabbhaharaeṇa
jassa ṇisammaï uare uṇhāyaṃtatthaṇī jāyā
kamalāyarāṇa uṇho hemaṃto sīalo jaṇavayassa
ko kira bhiṇṇasahāvaṃ jāṇaï paramatthayaṃ loe
hema.mte himaraadhūsarassa oasaraṇassa pahiyassa
sumariyajāyāmuhasijjirassa sīyaṃ ciya paṇaṭṭhaṃ
uvaïsaï laḍiyāṇa kaḍḍhei rasaṃ ṇa dei sottuṃ je
jaṃtassa juvvaṇassa ya ṇa hoi icchu cciya sahāvo
bahuehi jaṃpiehiṃ siṭṭhaṃ amha savahe kareūṇa
saddo cciya se bhaddo bhoiṇijaṃte raso ṇa tthi
paḍhamaṃ ciya māhavapaṭṭayaṃ va ghettūṇa ḍāhiṇo vāo
aṃkollapaḍhamavattaṃ pahiṃḍio gāmaracchāsu
so māṇo piyamuhaaṃdadaṃsaṇe kaha thiro dharijjihaï
aṃkollakoraāṇa vi jo phuṭṭamuhāṇa bīhei
kāraṇagahio vi mae māṇo emea jaṃ samosariyo
atthakkaphulla aṃkolla tujjha taṃ matthae paḍaü
raṃjeha deha rūvaṃ raeha kusumāi deha vicchittiṃ
ṇa vi taha puhavīsassa vi halahalao jaha vasaṃtassa
sisire vaṇadavaḍaḍḍhaṃ vasaṃtamāsammi uaha saṃbhūyaṃ
maṃkusakaṇṇasaricchaṃ dīsaï pattaṃ palāsassa
dūrapaïṇṇaparimalaṃ sapallavaṃ muddhapupphapaṃguraṇaṃ
aṃgacchittaṃ piva vammaheṇa diṇṇaṃ mahusirīe
kāraṇagahiaṃ pi imā māṇaṃ moei māṇiṇiaṇassa
sahayāramaṃjarī piyasahi vva kaṇṇe samallīṇā
ajjaṃ ciya chaṇadiaho mā putti ruehi ehaï pio tti
suṇhaṃ āsāsaṃtī paḍiyattamuhī ruvaï sāsū
diyahediyahe ṇivaḍaï gihavaïdhūāṇiheṇa māucchā
saṃgahaṇaï tti vāvaü vasuhārā khujjasahayāre
āucchaṇovaūhaṇakaṃṭhasamosariyabāhulaïyāe
valayāi pahiyacalaṇe bahūĕ ṇiyalāi va paḍaṃti
uḍḍiyapāsaṃ taṇachaṇṇakaṃdaraṃ ṇihuasaṃṭhiyāvakkhaṃ
jūhāhiva parihara muhamettasarīyaṃ kala
guṇasāliṇo vi kariṇo hohaï jūhāhivattaṇaṃ katto
ṇavasālikavalalohilliāĕ viṃjhaṃ muaṃtassa
vihiṇā aṇujjueṇaṃ puttaya jāo kulammi paḍhamammi
jāivisuddho bhaddo vi baṃdhaṇaṃ pāvaï khaṇammi
caüpāsadiṇṇahuyavahavisamāha haveḍhaṇāpiulaṃ
ṇivvāheuṃ jāṇaï jūhaṃ jūhāhivo cceva
allaggakavoleṇa vi gayamaïṇā pattadasāvasaṇammi
ajja vi māĕ saṇāhaṃ gayavaïjūhaṃ dharaṃteṇa
ṇa vi taha dūmei maṇaṃ gayassa baṃdho vi kariṇiviraho vi
dāṇavioyavimuhie jaha bhamaraüle bhamaṃtammi
gāmammi mohaṇāiṃ diṇṇe khagge vva corahitthāiṃ
gahavaïṇo ṇāmeṇaṃ kiyāi aṇneṇa vi jaṇeṇa
maliṇāiṃ aṃgāiṃ bāhiraloeṇa maṃsaluddheṇa
hiyayaṃ hiyaeṇa viṇā ṇa dei vāhī bhamaï haṭṭaṃ
kaḍhiṇakharavīrapellaṇahalaṃ va pattharaviṇiggayaggikaṇe
dhacaloāyariyavahe kasarā vi suheṇa vaccaṃti
ṇakkhamaūhesu khaṇaṃ kusumesu khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ kisalaesu
hatthesu khaṇaṃ kusumocciyāi loḍāviyā bhasalā
chettammi jeṇa ramiyā tāo kira tassa ceya maṃdei
jaï tīa imaṃ ṇisuyaṃ phuṭṭaï hiyayaṃ harisayāe
hiyayaṃ ṇiyāmi kaḍhiṇaṃ pā hāseṇa ghaḍiyaṃ me
virahāṇaleṇa tattaṃ rasasittaṃ aṃtitā phuḍaha
aṇṇe te kila sihiṇo siṇarasaseeṇa huṃti vicchāyā
āsāiyarasaseo hoi viseseṇa ṇehajo dahaṇo
aṃto ṇibhuaṭhṭhiapariaṇāi oruddhadāraṇaaṇāi
gimhe ghoraṭṭaghagghararaveṇa ghoraṃti va gharaṭṭa
jīhāi paraṃ libbhaï daṃtoṭṭheṇaṃ ṇa tīrae gahiuṃ
aharo vva savvaṇo gohaṇeṇa paḍhamo taṇuccheo
jaha vellīhi ṇa māasi jaha icchasi paravaïṃ pi laṃgheuṃ
taha ṇūṇaṃ kohalie ajjaṃ kalhiṃ va phullihisi
vilāsaṇiguruṇiaṃvo tīraü calaṇehi dohi uvvahiuṃ
eāī uṇa majjho thaṇabhāraṃ kaï ṇu uvvahi
vārijjaṃtī ṇavakomui tti mā putti aṃgaṇe suvasu
mā te aṃvupisāo caṃdo tti muhaṃ gasijjihii
suvvaṃto āsi paraṃparāi kahakaha vi diṭṭhimilio 'si
de suhaa kiṃ pi jaṃpasu piaṃtu kaṇṇāi me amiaṃ
virahakisiā varāī diṇāi āsaṇṇagimhapariṇāmāiṃ
kaḍhiṇahiao pavāsī ṇa āṇimo kaha samappihii
roāvia mha māe aṃgaṇapahieṇa darapasutteṇa
parivattasu māṇiṇi māṇiṇi tti siviṇe bhaṇaṃteṇa
māṇaṃsiṇīa païṇā ṇaaṇakavolāharappahābhiṇṇā
ujjuasuracāvaṇihā vāhoārā ciraṃ diṭṭhā
sarahasaviṇiggaāi vi icchāi tumaṃ ṇa tīa saccavio
sīsāhaavaliabhuaṃgavaṃkaracche haaggāme
sā tuha virahe ṇikkiva saṃdhārijjaï sahīhi ṇiuṇāhi
caṃḍālahatthagaasaüṇia vva jīe ṇirālaṃvā
kappāsaṃ kuppāsaṃtarammi taï khittam itti bhaṇiūṇa
attā valā 'hireṇaṃ thaṇāṇa maha kāriā 'vatthā
gāīu paṃcakhāriṃbharīu cattāri pakkalavaïllā
saṃpaṇṇaṃ vālāvallaraaṃ sevā sivaṃ kuṇaü
aṇurāaraaṇabhariaṃ kaṃcaṇakalasa vva taruṇithaṇavaṭṭaṃ
tassa cia muhammi kiā masimuddā maaṇarāeṇa
vijja piāsā vahalaï ghaṇatāo khaṇakhaṇammi romaṃco
hiae ṇa bhāi aṇṇaṃ lajjāpatthehi tejiā pāṇā
gāhāṇa a geāṇa a tantītattitantrīsaddāṇa poḍhamahilāṇa
tāṇaṃ so cciatāṇi so bbiatāṇi sa bbiateṣāṃ sa eva daṇḍo je tāṇaje tāṇaṃya teṣāṃte eṣāṃ rasaṃ ṇa āṇaṃtijāṇaṃti

div.head: Wer nicht liebt Wein, Weib, Gesang . . .
div.p: Die Lieder und Gesänge und Lautenklänge blühender Frauen—die sind bereits gestraft, welche deren Genuss nicht kennen.
Finales o und e werden in T mehrfach kurz gebraucht, s. die Verdopplung des Anlautes von ccia hier, und das vielfache Ausgehen der obliquen Casus des Fem. Sgl. auf ĕ (cf. KR).

lg.l: vivarīaraammi sirī bamhaṃ daṭṭhūṇa ṇāhikamalatthaṃ
hariṇo dāhiṇaaṇaṃ rasāulā jhatti ḍhakkei
laḍahavilaāṇa loaṇakaḍakkhavikkhevajaṇiasaṃdāvā
jhijjaṃti mahāsattā cittuvveaṇasahā hoṃti
taha hasa jaha ṇa hasijjasi taha jaṃpa jahā parappiaṃ hoi
taha jia jaha lahasi jasaṃ taha mara jaha ṇa uṇa saṃbhavasi
chappaa gammasu sisiraṃ pāsākusumehi tāva mā marasu
jīaṃto dacchihisi a puṇo vi riddhiṃ vasaṃtassa
savvattha hoi ṭhāṇaṃ rāsahamahisāṇa mesavusahāṇaṃ
bhaddagaïṃdāṇam aho mahāvaṇam ahava mahārāo
avvo ṇa āmi chettaṃ khajjaü sālī vi kīraṇivahehiṃ
jāṇaṃtā avi pahiā pucchaṃti puṇopuṇo maggaṃ
atthakkāgaadiṭṭhe vahuā jāmāduammi gurupurao
jūraï ṇivaḍaṃtāṇaṃ harisaviphaṃdaṃtavalaāṇaṃ
acchīhi tujjha suṃdari bāhiradhavalehi majjhakasaṇehi
eehi ko ṇa damio pisuṇehi va kaṇṇalaggehi
eha imīa ṇiacchaha vimhiahiaā sahī puloei
addāammi kavolaṃ kavolapaṭṭammi addāaṃ
kaïā jāā kaïā ṇu sikkhiā māiā haakumārī
taṃtaṃ jāṇaï savvaṃ jaṃjaṃ mahilāŏ jāṇaṃti
khaṇapiṭṭhadhūsaratthaṇi mahumaataṃbacchi kuvalaābharaṇe
kaṇṇagaacūamaṃjari putti tue maṃḍio gāmo
maggialaddhe balamoḍicuṃbie appaṇeṇa uvaṇīde
ekkammi piāahare aṇṇaṇṇā hoṃti rasaheā
upphullaloaṇeṇaṃ kavolabosaṭṭamāṇaseeṇaṃ
ahaṇaṃteṇa vi bhaṇiā muheṇa se kajjaṇivvuttī
jattha ṇa ujjāgarao jattha ṇa īsā visūraṇaṃ māṇo
sabbhāvacāḍuaṃ jattha ṇa tthi ṇeho tahiṃ ṇa tthi
maha païṇā thaṇajuale pattaṃ lihiaṃ ti gavviā kīsa
ālihaï mahaṃ pi pio jaï se kaṃpo ccia ṇa hoi
kaṇṇe paḍiaṃ hiae paḍiaṃ cia o mae abhavvāe
jāmi tti tujjha vaaṇaṃ kiṃ va ṇa sahiaṃ pavāsassa
samapaṃthapatthiassa vi pahiassa khalaṃti puḍhamadiahammi
hiaaṭṭhiajāāguruṇiaṃvahāreṇa va paāi
saṃdeso vi ṇa lihio lehe pahieṇa kattha gharatattī
aṇavaraalihiagehiṇigottakkharapūrie patte
uppekkhāgaadaïaṃgasaṃgamuccaliaviuṇaseāe
bolīṇo vi ṇa ṇāo paütthapaïāi hemaṃto
siviṇaaladdhapiaamapulaïuggamaṇibbharehi aṃgehiṃ
pariraṃbhaṇe suhāiṃ pāvaü mā ṇaṃ paboheha
vijjhāvei païvaṃ abbhuṭṭhaṃtīĕ pahiajāāe
piaamavioadīharaṇīsahaṇīsāsariṃcholī
jaṃ pīaṃ maṃgalavāsaṇāĕ patthāṇapaḍhamadiahammi
bāhasalilaṃ ṇa ciṭṭhaï taṃ cia virahe ruvaṃtīe
ukkaṃṭhāṇicchāā savvaṃ uṇa pariaṇaṃ ruāvei
āaṃbirehi ajjhā phusiaparuṇṇehi acchīhi
jaha diahavirāmo ṇavasirīsagaṃdhuddhurāṇilagghavio
pahiaghariṇīa ṇa tahā tavei tivvo vi majjhaṇho
cirapavasiadaïakahā ṇiuṇāhi sahīhi virahasahaṇatthaṃ
aliā avi avarāhā vahūĕ kamaso kahijjaṃti
jaṃjaṃ paütthapaïā piaamaṇāmakkharaṃ lihaï lehe
taṃtaṃ tallehaṇiāṇusāragalio pusaï seo
acchaü ṇimīliacchī mā mā vāreha piaamāsāe
teṇa viṇā kiṃ pecchaü ummillehiṃ vi acchīhiṃ
dīhuṇhā ṇīsāsā raṇaraṇao rujjagaggiraṃ geaṃ
piavirahe jīviavallahāṇa eso ccia viṇoo
jaï devva tuṃ pasaṇṇo mā karihisi majjha māṇusaṃ jammaṃ
jaï jammaṃ mā pemmaṃ jaï pemmaṃ mā jaṇe dulahe
rāīṇa bhaṇaï loo jā kila gimhammi hoṃti maḍahāo
maha uṇa daïeṇa viṇā ṇa āṇimo kīsa vaḍḍhaṃti
ekke aaṇe diahā vīe raaṇīŏ hoṃti dīhāo
virahāaṇo apuvvo ettha duve ccea vaḍḍhaṃti
cirajīvittaṇakaṃkhiri mā tamma rasāaṇehi athirehi
virahaṃ pavajja jāaṃti jeṇa juadīharā diahā
ruaï ruaṃtīĕ mae ohidiṇe gaṇaï jhijjaï ahaṃ va
piavirahe māmi saajjhiāĕ ṇeho ccia apuvvo
kaṃṭhaggahaṇeṇa saajjhiāĕ abbhāgaovaāreṇa
vahuāĕ païmmi vi āgaammi sāmaṃ muhaṃ jāaṃ
caṃdo vi caṃdavaaṇe muṇālabāhālae muṇālāiṃ
iṃdīvarāi iṃdīvaracchi tāveṃti tuha virahe
guruaṇaparavasa pia kiṃ bhaṇāmi tuha maṃdabhāiṇī ahaaṃ
ajja pavāsaṃ vajjasi vacca saaṃ cea muṇasi karaṇijjaṃ
vitthiṇṇaṃ mahiveḍhaṃ viulaṇiaṃbāŏ pīṇathaṇiāo
labbhaṃti visālacchīŏ suhaa juvaīŏ mā tamma
kajjaṃ viṇā vi vialaṃtapemmarāaṃ tumaṃ ṇiacchaṃtī
hiaāsaṃkiaṇiadosadummaṇā tāmaï varāī
dūī ṇa ei caṃdo vi uggao jāmiṇī vi bolei
savvaṃ savvattho ccia visaṃṭhulaṃ kassa kiṃ bhaṇimo
dūī gaā cirāaï kiṃ so maha pāsam ehii ṇa ve 'tti
jīviamaraṇaṃtarasaṃṭhiāĕ aṃdolae hiaaṃ
so ṇā 'gao tti pecchaha parihāsullāvirīĕ dūīe
ṇūmaṃtīa pahariso osaṭṭaï gaṃḍapāsesu
kaha ṇu gaā kaha diṭṭho kiṃ bhaṇiaṃ kiṃ va teṇa paḍibhaṇiaṃ
eaṃ cia ṇa samappaï puṇaruttaṃ jaṃpamāṇīe
dūīmuhaaṃdapuloirīĕ kiṃ bhaṇihii tti ajjhāe
piasaṃgamalaliamaṇorahāĕ hiaaṃ tharatharei
appāhiāi tuha teṇa jāi tāiṃ mae ṇa muṇiāi
accuṇhassāsaparikkhalaṃtavisamakkharapaāiṃ
sāheṃtī sahi suhaaṃ khaṇekhaṇe dūmiā si majjha kae
sabbhāvaṇehakaraṇijjasarisaaṃ dāva viraïaṃ tumae
jaṃ tuha kajjaṃ taṃ cia kajjaṃ majjha tti jaṃ saā bhaṇasi
o dūi saccavaaṇe ajja si pāraṃ gaā tassa
ṇavalaapaharuttatthāĕ taṃ kaaṃ haliavahuāe
jaṃ ajja vi juvaïjaṇo ghareghare sikkhiuṃ mahaï
dhaṇṇo si re haliddaa haliasuāpīṇathaṇabharucchaṃge
pecchaṃtassa vi païṇo jaha tuha kusumāi ṇivaḍaṃti
saccaṃ cia kaṭṭhamao suraṇāho jeṇa haliadhūāe
hatthehi kamaladalakomalehi cikko ṇa pallavio
emea akaapuṇṇā appattamaṇorahā vivajjissaṃ
jaṇavāo vi ṇa jāo teṇa samaṃ haliutteṇa
lajjāpajjattapasāhaṇāi paratattiṇippivāsāiṃ
aviṇaadiṃmohāiṃ dhaṇṇāṇa ghare kalattāiṃ
hasiam aviāramuddhaṃ bhamiaṃ virahiavilāsasacchāaṃ
bhaṇiaṃ sahāvasaralaṃ dhaṇṇāṇa ghare kalattāṇaṃ
païṇā vaṇṇijjaṃte akkhāṇaasuṃdarīĕ rūvammi
īsāmaccharagaruaṃ ghariṇī huṃkāraaṃ dei
vāhijjaṃti ṇa kassa vi rottūṇaṃ ṇea pāaḍijjaṃti
māṇaviārā kulapāliāĕ hiae vilāveṃti
ahiaṃ suṇṇāi ṇiraṃjaṇāi vaïrikkaruṇṇapusiāi
virahukkaṃṭhaṃ kulapāliāi sāhaṃti acchīiṃ
kulapāliāĕ pecchaha jovvaṇalāaṇṇavibbhamavilāsā
pavasaṃti vva pavasie eṃti vva pie gharaṃ eṃte
païpurao ccia rabhaseṇa cuṃbio devaro aḍaaṇāe
maha vaaṇaṃ maïrāgaṃdhiaṃ ti hāā tuhaṃ bhaṇaï
taha aḍaaṇāĕ ruṇṇaṃ païmaraṇe bāharuddhakaṃṭhīe
aṇumaraṇasaṃkiṇo jaha jārassa vi saṃkiaṃ hiaaṃ
vāṇīrakuḍuṃguḍḍīṇasaüṇikolāhalaṃ suṇaṃtīe
gharakammavāvuḍāe vahūĕ sīaṃti aṃgāiṃ
ṇollei aṇollamaṇā attā maṃ gharabharammi saalammi
khaṇamettaṃ jaha saṃjhāĕ ṇavara ṇa va hoi vīsāmo
ṭhāṇeṭhāṇe valiā valaṇevalaṇe saveḍasakuḍuṃgā
ṇa gao si amha gāmaṃ diara ṇa diṭṭhā tue muralā
mahuehi kiṃ va vālaa harasi ṇiaṃbāhi jaï vi me siaaṃ
sāhāmi kassa raṇṇe dūre gāmo ahaṃ ekkā
kālakkharadūsikkhia dhammia re ṇiṃbakīḍaasariccha
doṇṇa vi ṇiraaṇivāso samaaṃ jaï hoi tahi hodu
paṃthaa ṇa ettha saṃtharam atthi maṇaṃ pattharatthale gāme
uṇṇaapaahare pekkhiūṇa jaï vasasi tā vasasu
vihalakkhaṇaṃ tumaṃ sahi daṭṭhūṇa kuḍeṇa taralataradiṭṭhiṃ
vārapphaṃsaṇiheṇa a appā garuo tti pāḍiavihiṇṇo
aïviulaṃ jalakuṃbhaṃ ghettūṇa samāgaa mhi sahi turiaṃ
samaseasalilaṇīsāsaṇīsahā vīsamāmi khaṇaṃ
aṇumaraṇe hasaï jaṇo rottuṃ vi ṇa labbhaï jahecchaṃ
tā ettha kiṃ karissaṃ coriaramaṇe vivajjaṃte
mā putti vaṃkabhaṇiaṃ jaṃpasu purao tumaṃ chaüllāṇaṃ
hiaeṇa jaṃ ca bhaṇiaṃ taṃ pi haāsā viāṇaṃti
vaṃkabhaṇiāi katto katto addhacchipecchiavvāi
ūsasiuṃ pi ṇa tīraï chaüllaparivārie gāme
tattha vi hoṃti sahīo puttali mā ruvasu jattha diṇṇā si
tattha vi ṇiuṃjalīlā tattha vi girivāhiṇī golā
kassa va ṇa hoi roso daṭṭhūṇa piāĕ savvaṇaṃ aharaṃ
sabhamarakamalagghāiri vāriavāme sahasu eṇhiṃ
chappattiā vi khajjaï ṇippatte putti ettha ko doso
ṇiapurise vi ramijjaï parapurisavivajjie gāme
amuṇiaparapurisasuho jaṃpaü jaṃ kiṃ pi aṇṇao loo
ṇiapurisehi vi amhe parapuriso tti ccia ramāmo
māe gharovaaraṇaṃ ajja khu ṇa tthi tti sāhiaṃ tumae
tā bhaṇa kiṃ karaṇijjaṃ emea ṇa vāsaro ṭhāi
sacchaṃdaramaṇadaṃsaṇasaṃvaḍḍhiagaruavammahavilāsaṃ
suviaḍḍhavesavilaāramiaṃ ko vaṇṇiuṃ taraï
sāmaṇṇasuṃdarīṇaṃ vibbhamam āvahaï aviṇao ccea
dhūmo vi hu pajjaliāṇaṃ mahuro hoi surabhidārūṇaṃ
avvo kālassa gaī so vi juā sarasakavvadullalio
paḍhaï parāsarasaddaṃ amhe vi ṇiaṃ païṃ gamimo
paṇamaha māṇassa halā calaṇe kiṃ devaehi aṇṇehiṃ
jassa pasāeṇa pio gholaï pāaṃtapāsesu

div.head: Eingangsgebet des Cento
div.p: Neigt euch, Freundinnen! zu den Füssen des Schmollens! was ist's mit den andern Göttern! Durch seine Gunst wältz sich der Liebste zu unsern Füssen.

lg.l: aṇuṇaapasaraṃ pāapaḍanūsavaṃ rabhasacuṃbaṇasuhelliṃ
eāi a aṇṇāi a avaso vva kao phalaï māṇo
jaï puttali bahuehiṃ aṇuṇaasokkhehi atthi de kajjaṃ
tāva rua geṇha māṇaṃ khaṇamettaṃ tammi suhaammi
āṇā aṇālavaṃtīĕ kīrae dīsae parāhutto
ṇiṃtammi ṇīsisijjaï putti apuvvokkhu de māṇo
jaṃjaṃ bhaṇaha sahīo āma karissāma savvahā taṃtaṃ
jaï taraha ruṃbhiuṃ maha dhīraṃ samuhāgae tammi
alliaï diṭṭhiṇibbhacchio vi vihuo vi laggae siae
pahao vi cuṃbaï balā alajjae kaha ṇu kuppissaṃ
himajoacuṇṇahatthāŏ jassa dappaṃ kuṇaṃti rāīo
kaha tassa piassa mae tīraï māṇo halā kāuṃ
kiṃ bhaṇaha maṃ sahīo karehi māṇaṃ ti kiṃ tha māṇeṇa
sabbhāvavāhire tammi majjha māṇeṇa vi ṇa kajjaṃ
jaïā pio ṇa dīsaï bhaṇaha halā kassa kīrae māṇo
aha diṭṭhammi vi māṇo tā tassa piattaṇaṃ katto
jāṇimi kaāvarāhaṃ jāṇimi aliāi bhaṇaï saalāi
aṇuṇeṃte uṇa jāṇe kaāvarāhaṃ va appāṇaṃ
avarāhasahassāiṃ bharimo hiaeṇa tammi addiṭṭhe
diṭṭhammi uṇa piasahī ekkaṃ pi hu ṇaṃ ṇa saṃbharimo
bhaṇabhaṇa jaṃjaṃ paḍihāi tujjha taṃtaṃ sahāmimo amhe
asahattaṇaṃ ca jīaṃ ca vallabhe doi ṇa ghaḍaṃti
eaṃ cia maha ṇāmaṃ bhaṇabhaṇa de suhaa kiṃ vilakkho si
paḍihāi jaṃ ṇa tujjha vi mamaṃ pi kiṃ deṇa ṇāmeṇa
suhaa muhuttaṃ suppaü jaṃ te paḍihāi taṃ pi bhaṇṇihisi
ajja ṇa pecchaṃti tuhaṃ ṇiddāgaruāi acchīi
mā velavesu bahuaṃ puttaa aliehi gottehiṃ
esā vi jāṇaï ccia parihāsummissabhaṇiāiṃ
aï caṃḍi kiṃ ṇa pecchasi jaï so vāharaï aṇṇagotteṇa
aha de icchaï maccharapaṇacciacchaṃ muhaṃ daṭṭhuṃ
veārijjasi muddhe gottakkhaliehi mā khu tuṃ ruvasu
kiṃ va ṇa pecchaï aṇṇaha eddahamettehi acchīhiṃ
sottuṃ suhaṃ ṇa labbhaï avvo pemmassa vaṃkavisamassa
dugghaḍiamaṃcaassa va khaṇekhaṇe pāapaḍaṇeṇa
ekkasaaṇammi sumuhī vimuhī garueṇa māṇabaṃdheṇa
siviṇakalahammi hoṃtī parammuhī sammuhī jāā
vaḍḍhaü tā tuha gavvo bhaṇṇasi re jaï vihaṃḍaṇaṃ vaaṇaṃ
saccaṃ ṇa ei ṇiddā tue viṇā dehi oāsaṃ
kaaviccheo sahibhaṃgibhaṇiasabbhāviāvarāhāe
jhaḍi āpallavaï puṇo ṇaaṇakavolesu kovatarū
ummūlaṃti va hiaaṃ aṇuṇijjaṃtīŏ māṇavaṃtīo
saṃbhariamaṇṇuṇibbharabāhabharoruṃbhiamuhīo
ṇa vi taha takkhaṇasuamaṇṇudukkhaviaṇāŏ vi ruvaṃti
jaha diṭṭhammi piaame aṇuṇijjaṃtīŏ taruṇīŏ
hiae rosukkhittaṃ pāapahāraṃ sireṇa patthaṃto
ṇa hao daïo māṇaṃsiṇīĕ thoraṃsuaṃ ruṇṇaṃ
piaamaviiṇṇacasaaṃ acakkhiaṃ piasahīĕ deṃtīe
abhaṇaṃtīĕ vi māṇaṃsiṇīĕ kahio ccia viroho
vaccihii sa gharaṃ se lahihii oāsam ehii saāsaṃ
bhaṇihii jaṃ bhaṇiavvaṃ paccuttaṃ kiṃṇu pāvihii
taṇuāiā varāī diahediahe miaṃkaleha vva
bahalapaoseṇa tue ṇisaṃsa aṃdhāriamuheṇa
dāvaṃteṇa tuha muhaṃ bhumaābhaṃgammi hoṃtaṇavasohaṃ
akaeṇa uvakaaṃ ajja maṇṇuṇā majjha pasiacchi
bhiuḍī ṇa kaā kaḍuaṃ ṇā 'laviaṃ aharaaṃ ṇa pajjuṭṭhaṃ
uvaūhiā ṇa ruṇṇā eeṇa vi jāṇimo māṇaṃ
kiṃ pi ṇa jaṃpasi kāmaṃ bhaṇiaṃ ca karesi taṃ tahā turiaṃ
hiaaṃ rosuvveaṃ ti tujjha viṇao ccia kahei
paripucchiā ṇa jaṃpasi cuṃbijjaṃtī balā muhaṃ harasi
parihāsamāṇavimuhe pasiacchi maṇaṃ mha dūmesi
aï pīṇatthaṇaütthaṃbhiāṇaṇe suaṇu suṇasu maha vaaṇaṃ
athirammi jujjaï ṇa jovvaṇammi māṇo pie kāduṃ
taralacchi caṃdavaaṇe thoratthaṇi kariaroru taṇumajjhe
dīhā ṇa samappaï sisirajāmiṇī kaha ṇu de māṇo
suhaā vi suṃḍarī vi hu taruṇī vi hu māṇiṇi tti ā putti
caṃdaṇalaṭṭhi vva huaṃgadūmiā kiṃ ḍu dūmesi
paḍivakkhassa vi purao samuhaṃ bhaṇiā si teṇa pasia tti
avalaṃbiassa māṇiṇi māṇassa a kiṃ phalaṃ aṇṇaṃ
kaḍḍhesi caliavalae hatthe muṃcesi ahamuhī bāhaṃ
paḍiruṃbhasi ṇīsāse bahuaṃ te māṇaviṇṇāṇaṃ
kajjaṃ viṇā vi kaamāṇaḍaṃbarā pulaabhiṇṇasavvaṃgī
ujjallāliṃgaṇasokkhalālasā putti muṇiā si
haṃho kiṃ va ṇa diṭṭhaṃ halā mae jīviaṃ dharaṃtīe
so maṃ aṇuṇei pio ahaṃ pi aṇuṇijjimi haāsā
tā sokkhaṃ tāva raī tā raṇaraṇaassa ṇa tthi oāso
jā dukkhekkaṇihāṇe ṇa hoi bahuvallahe pemmaṃ
māṇahariehi gaṃtuṃ ṇa tīrae so ṇaei avarāhī
ko vi apatthiamuṇio ṇejjaṃ maṃtaṃ va āṇejja
uvvahaï daïagahiā haroṭṭhajhijjaṃtakovagaarāaṃ
pāṇosaraṃtamaïraṃ va phalihacasaaṃ muhaṃ bālā
gāḍhāliṃgaṇarabhasujjaammi daïe lahuṃ samosaraï
māṇaṃsiṇīĕ māṇo phellaṇabhīo vva hiaāhi
tuṃgo thiro visālo jo sahi me māṇapavvao raïo
so daïadiṭṭhivajjāsaṇīĕ ghāe viṇa pahuṃto
sahi viraïūṇa māṇassa majjha dhīrattaṇeṇa oāsaṃ
piaamadaṃsaṇavihalakkhaṇammi sahase 'tti teṇa osariaṃ
ṇahapaapasāhiaṃgo ṇiddāghummaṃtaloaṇo ṇa tahā
jaha ṇivvaṇāharo sāmalaṃga dūmesi maha hiaaṃ
paccakkhamaṃtukāraa jaï cuṃbasi me ime haakavole
tā majjha piasahīe visesao kīsa taṇhāo
taïā maha gaṃḍatthalaṇimiaṃ diṭṭhiṃ ṇa ṇesi aṇṇatto
eṇhiṃ sa ccea ahaṃ te a kavolā ṇa sā diṭṭhī
tāṇa guṇaggahaṇāṇaṃ tāṇ' ukkaṃṭhāṇa tassa pemmassa
tāṇa bhaṇiāṇa suṃdara īrisaaṃ jāam avasāṇaṃ
aliakuviaṃ pi kaamaṃtuaṃ va maṃ jesu suhaa aṇuṇeṃto
tāṇa diahāṇa haraṇe ruāmi ṇa uṇo ahaṃ kuviā
āma tuha ṇā 'varāho piaama me loaṇāṇa iha doso
māṇāsahammi caḍulehi vāsio jehi hiaammi
ko suhaa tujjha doso haahiaaṃ ṇiṭṭhuraṃ majjha
pecchasi aṇimisaṇaaṇo jaṃpasi viṇaaṃ ṇa jaṃpase piṭṭhaṃ
vacca maha ccia ekkāĕ hoṃtu ṇīsāsaroiavvāi
mā tujjha vi tīĕ viṇā dakkhiṇṇahaassa jāṇīaṃtu
aṇuvattaṃto amhārisaṃ jaṇaṃ āhijāīe
ciṃtesi uṇo hiae aṇāhijāī suhaṃ jaaï
huṃ ṇillajja samosara taṃ cia aṇuṇesu jīĕ de eaṃ
pāaṃgụṭṭhālattaaraseṇa tilaaṃ viṇimmaviaṃ
sā vasaï tujjha hiae sa ccia acchīsu sā a siviṇesu
amhārisāṇa suṃdara oāso kattha pāvāṇa
taṇhā me tujjha piattaṇassa kaha taṃ ti ṇo hi jāṇāmo
de suhaa tumaṃ cia sikkhavesu jaha de piā homi
maliṇavasaṇāṇa kiavaṇiāṇaṃ āpaṃḍugaṃḍapālīṇaṃ
pupphavaïāṇa kāmo aṃgesu kaāuho vasaï
pupphavaïa mhi bālaa mā civasu adīharāuso hosi
ajjaṃ cea marijjaü maacchi kiṃ kālaharaṇeṇa
vāṇiaa hatthidaṃtā katto amhāṇa vagghakattīo
jāva luliālaamuhī gharammi parisakkae soṇhā
gaṇhaṃti piaamāṇa vaaṇāhi haṃsīŏ visalaaddhāi
hiaāi va kusumāuhabāṇakaāṇearaṃdhāi
haṃsāṇa sarehi sirī sārijjaï aha sarāṇa haṃsehi
aṇṇoṇṇaṃ cia ee appāṇaṃ ṇavara garuaṃti
aṇudiahakaābhoā jahajaha thaṇaā viṇiṃti kumarīe
tahataha laddhoāso vva vammaho hiaam āvisaï
kesā paṃḍurachāā asaīsaṃgeṇa camma jajjariaṃ
cittaṃ tuha sohaggaṃ godā dūittaṇaṃ kuṇaï
ṇiṇṇiddaṃ dobballaṃ ciṃtā alasattaṇaṃ saṇīsasiaṃ
maha maṃdabhāiṇīe kae sahi tumaṃ vi ahaha paribhavaï
ṇiadaïadaṃsaṇūsua paṃthia aṇṇeṇa vaccasu paheṇa
gharavaïdhūā dullaṃ ghavāurā ṭhāi haagāme
āsāiaṃ aṇṇāeṇa jettiaṃ tā tui ṇa bahuā dhiī
uvaramasu vusaha eṇhiṃ rakkhijjaï gehavaïkhettaṃ
ucciṇasu paḍiakusumaṃ mā dhuṇa sehāliaṃ haliasuṇhe
esa avasāṇaviraso sasureṇa suo valaasaddo
pavisaṃtī gharadāraṃ vivaliavaaṇā viloiūṇa pahaṃ
khaṃdhe mottūṇa ghaḍaṃ hāhā ṇaṭṭho tti ruasi sahi kiṃ ti
mā paṃtha ruṃdhasu paham abehi bālaa asesiahirīa
amhe aṇirikkāo suṇṇaṃ gharaaṃ va akkamasi
suvvaï samāgamissaï tujjha pio ajja paharametteṇa
emea kiṃ pi ciṭṭhasi tā sahi sajjesu karaṇijjaṃ
khaṇapāhuṇiā dearajāyā e suhaya kiṃ te de haṇidā
ruaï gharopaṃtaphaliṇigharammi aṇuṇijjaü varāī
pupphabharoṇamiabhūmigaasāhatarūṇa viṇṇavaṇaṃ
golāaḍaviaḍakuḍuṃgamahua...
gṛhiṇipraveśitajāre gṛhe gṛhe (gṛhiṇī) sthāpitā
militāvadati(asatī?)jārau paścād gṛhiṇī gṛhasthaś ca
ekkatto ruaï piā aṇṇatto samaratūraṇigghoso
pemmeṇa raṇaraseṇa a bhaḍassa ḍolāiaṃ hiaaṃ
kelīgottakkhalaṇe vikuppae keavaṃ aāṇaṃtī
duṭṭha uasu parihāsaṃ jāā saccaṃ cia paruṇṇā
de ā pasia ṇiattasu muhasasijoṇhāviluttatamaṇivahe
ahisāriāṇa vigghaṃ karesi aṇṇāṇa vi haāse
aṇṇaṃ lahuattaṇaaṃ aṇṇa ccia kāi vattaṇacchāā
sāmā sāmaṇṇapaāvaïṇo reha ccia ṇa hoi
alasasiromaṇi dhuttāṇa aggimo putti dhaṇasamiddhimao
ia bhaṇieṇa ṇaaṃgī papphullaviloaṇā jāā
ullollakaraaraaṇakkhaehi tuha loaṇesu maha diṇṇaṃ
rattaṃsuaṃ pasāo koveṇa puṇo ime ṇa akkamiā
e ehi dāva suṃdari kaṇṇaṃ dāūṇa suṇasu vaaṇijjaṃ
tujjha muheṇa kisoari caṃdo uamijjaï jaṇeṇa
eddahamettatthaṇiā eddahamettehi acchivattehiṃ
eddahamettāvatthā eddahamettehi diahehiṃ
karajuagahiajasoāthaṇamuhaviṇivesiāharapuḍassa
saṃbhariapaṃcajaṇṇassa ṇamaha kaṇhassa romaṃcaṃ
kā visamā devvagaī kiṃ dullabbhaṃ jaṇo guṇaggāhī
kiṃ sokkhaṃ sukalattaṃ kiṃ dukkhaṃ jaṃ khalo loo
kivaṇāṇa dhaṇaṃ ṇāāṇa phaṇamaṇī kesarāi sīhāṇaṃ
kulavāliāṇa a thaṇā katto jhiyyaṃti amuāṇaṃ
kesesu valāmoḍia teṇa samarammi jaassirī gahiā
jaha kaṃdarāhi vihurā tassa daḍhaṃ kaṃṭhaammi saṃṭhaviā
khalavavahārā dīsaṃti dāruṇā jaha vi taha vi dhīrāṇaṃ
hiaavaassavahumaā ṇa hu vavasāā vimujjhaṃti
jaṃ parihariuṃ tīraï maṇaṃ pi ṇa suṃdaraattaṇaguṇeṇa
aha ṇavaram assa doso paḍivacchehiṃ pi paḍivaṇṇo
jassa raṇaṃteurae kare kuṇaṃtassa maṃḍalaggalaaṃ
rasasammuhī vi sahasā parammuhī hoi riuseṇā
jassea vaṇo tassea veaṇā bhaṇaï taṃ jaṇo aliaṃ
daṃtakkhaaṃ kavole vahūĕ viaṇā savattīṇaṃ
jahā gahiro jahā raaṇaṇibbharo jaha a ṇimmalacchāo
taha kiṃ vihiṇā eso sabāṇio jalaṇihī ṇa kio
jā ṭheraṃ va hasaṃtī kaïvaaṇaṃvuruhavaddhaviṇivesā
dāvei bhuaṇamaṃḍalam aṇṇaṃ via (cia?) jaaï sā vāṇī
joṇhāi mahuraseṇa a viiṇṇatāruṇṇaücchuamaṇā sā
vuḍḍhā vi ṇavoḍha vva paravahū aha haraï tuha hiaaṃ
ṭuṃṭuṇṇaṃto marihisi kaṃṭaakaliāi keaïvaṇāiṃ
mālaïkusumasaricchaṃ bhamara bhamaṃto ṇa pāvihisi
ṇavapuṇṇimāmiaṃkassa suhaa ko taṃ si bhaṇasu maha saccaṃ
kā sohaggasamaggā paosaraaṇi vva tuha ajja
ṇihuaramaṇammi loaṇapahammi paḍie guruaṇamajjhammi
saalaparihārahiaā vaṇagamaṇaṃ cea mahaï vahū
taṃ tāṇa sirisahoararaaṇāharaṇammi hiaam ekkarasaṃ
viṃvāhare piāṇaṃ ṇivesiaṃ kusumavāṇeṇa
tālā jāaṃti guṇā jālā de sahiaehi gheppaṃti
raïkiraṇāṇugahiāi hoṃti kamalāi a kamalāiṃ
tuha vallahassa gosammi āsi aharo milāṇakamaladalo
ia ṇavavahuā soūṇa kuṇaï vaaṇaṃ mahīsamuhaṃ
maha desu rasaṃ dhamme tamavasam āsaṃ gamāgamā hara ṇe
haravahu saraṇaṃ taṃ cittamoham avasaraü me sahasā
rāīsu caṃdadhavalāsu laliam āphāliūṇa jo cāvaṃ
ekkacchattaṃ ccia kuṇaï bhuaṇarajjaṃ viaṃbhaṃto
lahiūṇa tujjha vāhupphaṃsaṃ jīe sa ko vi ullāso
jaalacchī tuha virahe ṇa hu 'jjalā duvvalāṇaṃ sā
vārijjaṃto vi uṇo saṃdāvakaatthieṇa hiaeṇa
thaṇaharavaassaeṇaṃ visuddhajāī ṇa calaï se hāro
saalakaraṇaparavīsāmasiriviaraṇaṃ ṇa sarasakavvassa
dīsaï aha va ṇisammaï sarisaṃ aṃsaṃsametteṇa
sahi ṇavaṇihuvaṇasamarammi aṃkavālīsahīĕ ṇiviḍāe
hāro ṇivārao ccia ucchīraṃto tadā kahaṃ ramiaṃ
so ṇa tthi ettha gāmo jo eaṃ mahamahaṃtalāaṇṇaṃ
taruṇāṇaṃ hiaaluḍiṃ parisakkaṃtiṃ ṇivārei
so suddhasāmalaṃgo dhammillo kalialaliaṇiadeho
tīe khaṃdhāhi valaṃ gahia saro suraasaṃgare jaaï
homi vahatthiareho ṇiraṃkuso aha vivearahio vi
siviṇe vi tumammi puṇo pattihi bhattiṃ ṇa sumarāmi
sajjei surahimāso ṇa āpaṇei juaïjaṇalakkhasahe
